dungeon/blood_fountain.png.description: A stone fountain filled with a bright red blood-like liquid, with dark ornate spigots at the top dripping red fluid into the basin.

dungeon/blood_fountain_2.png.description: An alternate variant of the blood fountain, featuring a stone basin filled with deep crimson liquid and dark decorative spigots overhead.

dungeon/blue_fountain.png.description: A stone fountain filled with glowing bright cyan water with sparkling white highlights, with dark ornate spigots pouring a stream of blue liquid into the basin.

dungeon/blue_fountain_2.png.description: An alternate variant of the blue fountain, showing a stone basin filled with luminous cyan liquid and dark overhead spigots, slightly dimmer than the primary variant.

dungeon/boulder.png.description: A large round boulder rendered in mottled orange-brown tones with a rough, rocky texture, depicted as a solid sphere.

dungeon/chest.png.description: An open wooden treasure chest with golden-yellow planks and visible wooden slats, shown from a slight top-down angle with the lid open revealing an empty interior.

dungeon/chest_2_closed.png.description: A closed golden-yellow wooden chest with a small latch on the front, shown from a top-down isometric angle with a flat lid.

dungeon/chest_2_open.png.description: A damaged or broken open chest in golden-brown wood with a chunk missing from the upper-left corner, revealing an open interior with loot inside.

dungeon/dry_fountain.png.description: A dry, empty stone fountain basin with dark overhead spigots producing no liquid, the basin interior appearing dark and barren.

dungeon/large_box.png.description: A large rectangular wooden storage box or crate in orange-brown tones with visible wood grain stripes and a small latch on the front face.

dungeon/mold_large_1.png.description: A scattered cluster of small green mold or fungal growths spread across a dark floor, with varied small rounded and elongated shapes.

dungeon/mold_large_2.png.description: A cluster of medium-sized bright green mold or fungal patches on a dark floor, with slightly larger and more defined lumpy shapes than the first variant.

dungeon/mold_large_3.png.description: A spread of vivid green mold growths on a dark floor, with rounded blob-like shapes of varying sizes arranged in a loose grouping.

dungeon/mold_large_4.png.description: A sparse scattering of small bright green mold or fungal pieces on a dark floor, fewer and more spread out than the other mold variants.

dungeon/sarcophagus_open.png.description: An open golden sarcophagus standing upright, decorated with ornate Egyptian-style vertical ridges and depicted in rich yellow-gold tones.

dungeon/sparkling_fountain.png.description: A stone fountain filled with brilliant sparkling cyan-white liquid, with a bright jet of water shooting upward from a dark spigot overhead, creating a dazzling magical effect.

dungeon/sparkling_fountain_2.png.description: An alternate variant of the sparkling fountain, showing a stone basin with glowing cyan-white sparkling water and a thin upward water jet, slightly less intense than the primary variant.

dungeon/unseen.png.description: A completely black tile representing unseen or unexplored dungeon area, with no visible detail.

dungeon/zot_pillar.png.description: A glowing pink-magenta spherical orb with swirling magical energy, suggesting a Zot-branch magical pillar or energy mass.

dungeon/altars/altar_ashenzari.png.description: A dark stone altar base covered in intricate cobweb or chain motifs in purple and violet tones, representing Ashenzari the god of knowledge and binding.

dungeon/altars/altar_base.png.description: A plain light grey stone altar base with a simple stepped rectangular pedestal shape and no decorative markings.

dungeon/altars/altar_beogh.png.description: A stone altar featuring a warrior statue holding swords flanked by two red candles on a grey tiered pedestal, representing the orcish god Beogh.

dungeon/altars/altar_cheibriados.png.description: A stone altar featuring a clock face with a snail body on a tiered stone pedestal, representing the slow god Cheibriados.

dungeon/altars/altar_cheibriados_10.png.description: A stone altar with a large clock face and a snail body on a tiered pedestal, with small rocky details at the sides, representing Cheibriados at a specific time variant.

dungeon/altars/altar_cheibriados_12.png.description: A stone altar with a clock face showing a slightly different time and a snail body on a tiered pedestal, a variant of the Cheibriados altar.

dungeon/altars/altar_cheibriados_2.png.description: A stone altar with a clock face and a snail body on a tiered pedestal, showing a clock hand position variant for Cheibriados.

dungeon/altars/altar_cheibriados_3.png.description: A stone altar with a large clock face and a snail body on a tiered grey pedestal, another time-position variant of the Cheibriados altar.

dungeon/altars/altar_cheibriados_4.png.description: A stone altar with a clock face and snail body on a tiered pedestal, displaying a different clock hand orientation as a Cheibriados variant.

dungeon/altars/altar_cheibriados_6.png.description: A stone altar with a clock face and snail on a tiered pedestal, with the clock hands in yet another position, one of many Cheibriados time variants.

dungeon/altars/altar_cheibriados_8.png.description: A stone altar with a clock face showing a specific hand position and a snail body on a tiered pedestal, a Cheibriados altar animation variant.

dungeon/altars/altar_cheibriados_9.png.description: A stone altar with a clock face and snail body on a tiered pedestal, showing yet another clock-hand position as part of the Cheibriados animated series.

dungeon/altars/altar_elyvilon.png.description: A white stone altar dedicated to Elyvilon, featuring an ornate chalice or urn atop a decorated pedestal with scroll-like carvings, rendered in clean white and grey tones.

dungeon/altars/altar_fedhas.png.description: An altar for Fedhas featuring a dark reddish-brown organic mound with green vine or plant growth and a yellow magical sparkle, on a brown wooden base.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_0.png.description: An altar for Jiyva depicted as a bright green slime or jelly mound on a tiered stone pedestal, glowing with vivid green color.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_1.png.description: A bright green slime mound altar with a rounded dome top and wide stepped stone base, a variant of Jiyva's altar.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_11.png.description: A bright green slime mound altar with a smooth arched top and wide stepped stone base, a variant of Jiyva's altar with a slightly rounder silhouette.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_2.png.description: A bright green slime mound altar with a flat-topped dome and layered stepped stone base, another variant of the Jiyva altar tile.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_3.png.description: A bright green slime mound altar with a blocky rectangular upper section and wide stepped stone base, a squarish variant of Jiyva's shrine.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_4.png.description: A medium-bright green slime mound altar with a wide arched top and stepped stone base, a slightly darker variant of Jiyva's altar.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_5.png.description: A medium green slime mound altar with a broad rounded top and raised stepped stone base, a softer-shaded variant of Jiyva's shrine tile.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_6.png.description: A medium green slime mound altar with an irregular lumpy top silhouette and wide stepped stone base, representing a weathered or slime-like Jiyva altar.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_7.png.description: A medium-dark green slime mound altar with a slightly asymmetric rounded top and stepped stone base, another Jiyva altar variant.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_8.png.description: A darker green slime mound altar with a bumpy organic top and wide stepped stone pedestal base, evoking Jiyva's slime-themed worship site.

dungeon/altars/altar_jiyva_9.png.description: A darker green slime mound altar with a smooth broad dome top and tiered stone base, the darkest toned variant in the Jiyva altar series.

dungeon/altars/altar_kikubaaqudgha.png.description: A grey stone altar dedicated to Kikubaaqudgha, topped with a mound of skulls and bones piled on a simple pedestal, evoking death and necromancy.

dungeon/altars/altar_lugonu.png.description: A stone altar dedicated to Lugonu, featuring a dark purple chaotic sigil or void symbol mounted on a grey pedestal, radiating a sense of corruption and chaos.

dungeon/altars/altar_makhleb_flame_1.png.description: A stone altar pedestal topped with a swirling red and orange flame, representing Makhleb the god of blood and carnage.

dungeon/altars/altar_makhleb_flame_2.png.description: A pixel art flame altar for Makhleb featuring two tall intertwining orange and red fire tongues rising from a grey stone base, representing the god of blood and fire.

dungeon/altars/altar_makhleb_flame_3.png.description: A pixel art flame altar for Makhleb depicting a wider spreading orange-yellow fire on a grey stone base, a second variant of Makhleb's flame altar.

dungeon/altars/altar_makhleb_flame_4.png.description: A grey stone altar base with a tall, animated orange and red flame rising from it, variant frame 4 of the Makhleb fire animation.

dungeon/altars/altar_makhleb_flame_5.png.description: A grey stone altar base with a tall, animated orange and red flame rising from it, variant frame 5 of the Makhleb fire animation.

dungeon/altars/altar_makhleb_flame_6.png.description: A grey stone altar base with a broad, animated orange and red flame rising from it, variant frame 6 of the Makhleb fire animation.

dungeon/altars/altar_makhleb_flame_7.png.description: A grey stone altar base with a wide, animated orange and red flame rising from it, variant frame 7 of the Makhleb fire animation.

dungeon/altars/altar_makhleb_flame_8.png.description: A grey stone altar base with a tall, asymmetric animated orange and red flame, variant frame 8 of the Makhleb fire animation.

dungeon/altars/altar_nemelex_xobeh.png.description: A stone altar pedestal displaying a purple crescent-shaped amulet decorated with gold dotted patterns and hanging red tassels, representing Nemelex Xobeh the card god.

dungeon/altars/altar_new.png.description: A plain grey stone altar pedestal with two thin sword icons flanking a small golden diamond gem at the center, representing a generic or new-style altar.

dungeon/altars/altar_okawaru.png.description: A grey stone altar pedestal flanked by two sword icons and bearing a shield emblem, representing Okawaru the god of combat and valor.

dungeon/altars/altar_old.png.description: A dark weathered stone altar pedestal with two candle or torch icons on either side and a small circular emblem, representing an old-style altar design.

dungeon/altars/altar_shining_one.png.description: A golden altar pedestal featuring a radiant golden cross with a sparkle effect, representing the Shining One, god of holy light and justice.

dungeon/altars/altar_sif_muna.png.description: A solid blue altar pedestal with a smooth bell or spire shape, representing Sif Muna the god of magic and knowledge.

dungeon/altars/altar_trog.png.description: A red-clad female warrior figure posed aggressively with weapons on a stone altar pedestal, representing Trog the god of berserking and martial fury.

dungeon/altars/altar_vehumet.png.description: A glowing white and cyan portal or magical tablet on a stone altar pedestal surrounded by scattered cyan sparkle particles, representing Vehumet the god of destructive magic.

dungeon/altars/altar_xom_0.png.description: A stone altar pedestal topped with a large grinning stone skull face with a wide smirk, representing Xom the unpredictable chaos god (variant 0).

dungeon/altars/altar_xom_1.png.description: A stone altar pedestal topped with a large grinning stone skull face with a slightly different smiling expression, representing Xom the chaos god (variant 1).

dungeon/altars/altar_xom_2.png.description: A stone altar pedestal topped with a large grinning stone skull face with a subtly distinct expression, representing Xom the chaos god (variant 2).

dungeon/altars/altar_xom_3.png.description: A stone altar bearing a grotesque carved face with a wide open mouth, baring teeth in an unhinged grin, in muted grey tones.

dungeon/altars/altar_xom_4.png.description: A stone altar with a disturbing carved face showing an unsettling smile and shadowed eyes, rendered in grey stone pixel art.

dungeon/altars/altar_xom_5.png.description: A stone altar featuring a carved monstrous face with a wide grin and hollow eyes, slightly varied expression from prior variants, grey stone style.

dungeon/altars/altar_xom_6.png.description: A stone altar with a carved chaotic face depicting a sneering, menacing expression with deep-set eyes, grey stone pixel art.

dungeon/altars/altar_xom_7.png.description: A stone altar topped with a large carved face showing a wide, maniacal grin and bulging features, representing the chaos god Xom.

dungeon/altars/altar_yredelemnul.png.description: A dark stone altar dedicated to Yredelemnul, featuring a ghostly grey figure bound with red threads or chains against a dark grey pedestal.

dungeon/altars/altar_zin.png.description: A pristine white stone altar glowing with holy light, topped with an upward-reaching hand and sparkling white cross, representing Zin's lawful purity.

dungeon/altars/ashenzari.png.description: An ornate altar for Ashenzari featuring a fractured diamond pattern with orange and red hues, representing chains and broken knowledge on a dark stone base.

dungeon/altars/cheibriados.png.description: A wooden hourglass altar with green snail shell decorations and a sword, representing the slow god Cheibriados, set on a brown wooden base.

dungeon/altars/dithmenos.png.description: A dark circular altar for Dithmenos with a deep purple glowing orb at its center set within concentric dark rings on a black pedestal base.

dungeon/altars/dithmenos_2.png.description: A second variant of Dithmenos's altar featuring a similar dark orb design with a slightly different purple glow intensity, dark concentric rings and shadowy base.

dungeon/altars/dithmenos_3.png.description: A third variant of Dithmenos's altar with a dark circular orb glowing faintly purple, set in dark rings on a black shadowy pedestal.

dungeon/altars/fedhas.png.description: A lush green altar for Fedhas Madash adorned with vines, flowers with red and yellow blooms, and a central orange sunburst symbol, representing nature and growth.

dungeon/altars/gozag_0.png.description: A golden altar with a large shining diamond gem on top and a soft yellow glow, representing the gold god Gozag, variant 0.

dungeon/altars/gozag_1.png.description: A golden altar with a large shining diamond gem on top surrounded by a bright glowing aura, representing Gozag, variant 1.

dungeon/altars/gozag_2.png.description: A golden altar with a large shining diamond gem on top and a diffuse bright yellow glow around it, representing Gozag, variant 2.

dungeon/altars/lugonu.png.description: A dark altar with purple cosmic swirling patterns and glowing magenta sigils on a stone base, associated with the chaotic god Lugonu.

dungeon/altars/misc_altar.png.description: A simple white-draped altar table with golden candles and a yellow chevron emblem, representing a generic or miscellaneous shrine.

dungeon/altars/nemelex_1.png.description: A grey stone altar displaying a fan of colorful tarot-style playing cards in red, purple, green, and multicolor with golden stars, representing Nemelex Xobeh, variant 1.

dungeon/altars/nemelex_2.png.description: An ornate altar with a white stone base adorned with gemstones, topped with a fan of colorful tarot-style playing cards including blue and multicolor cards, surrounded by golden sparkles, representing Nemelex Xobeh, variant 2.

dungeon/altars/nemelex_3.png.description: An ornate altar with a white stone base adorned with gemstones, topped with a fan of colorful tarot-style playing cards with yellow and green cards prominent, surrounded by golden sparkles, representing Nemelex Xobeh, variant 3.

dungeon/altars/nemelex_4.png.description: A ornate altar with a white stone base adorned with gemstones, topped with a fan of colorful playing cards (red, green, blue) surrounded by golden sparkles and a glowing yellow halo, representing Nemelex Xobeh's card-based worship.

dungeon/altars/nemelex_5.png.description: A variant of the Nemelex altar featuring a white stone base with gemstone decorations and a fan of colorful cards including a purple card, surrounded by golden sparkle effects.

dungeon/altars/qazlal_0.png.description: A dark stone altar pedestal with orange branching lightning or coral-like protrusions on each side and a glowing blue-grey smoky flame rising from the center, representing Qazlal's stormy domain.

dungeon/altars/qazlal_1.png.description: A variant Qazlal altar with dark grey stone base, orange forked branch decorations flanking both sides, and a blue misty or smoky ethereal flame hovering above.

dungeon/altars/qazlal_2.png.description: A third Qazlal altar variant showing the dark stone pedestal with orange branching coral/lightning side ornaments and a slightly different blue translucent flame effect above.

dungeon/altars/ru.png.description: A dark stone altar with balanced scales holding red gems and a blue crystal, symbolizing Ru's sacrifice and balance.

dungeon/altars/shining_one.png.description: An ornate golden altar with a radiant cross and sparkling light beams, representing the Shining One's holy divine power.

dungeon/altars/sif_muna.png.description: A deep blue pyramid-shaped stone altar covered in arcane runes and glowing blue magical script, representing Sif Muna the god of magic.

dungeon/altars/unknown.png.description: A grey stone altar topped with a large white question mark, indicating an unknown or unidentified deity's shrine.

dungeon/altars/vehumet_1.png.description: A glowing cyan rectangular altar panel with an intricate geometric star pattern and teal border columns, first variant for Vehumet god of destructive magic.

dungeon/altars/vehumet_2.png.description: A glowing cyan rectangular altar panel with an intricate geometric star pattern and teal dashed border columns, second variant for Vehumet god of destructive magic.

dungeon/altars/yredelemnul.png.description: A dark stone throne altar flanked by purple torches and adorned with a skull emblem, representing Yredelemnul the god of undeath.

dungeon/altars/zin.png.description: A white crystalline starburst altar with a divine hand motif and gleaming cross highlights, representing Zin the god of law and purity.

dungeon/doors/closed_door.png.description: A classic wooden double door with an arched stone frame, rendered in dark brown planks with gold horizontal banding.

dungeon/doors/detected_secret_door.png.description: A stone wall tile with a faintly outlined doorway shape indicating a hidden or secret door that has been magically detected, blending into the surrounding brownish-grey brick stone wall.

dungeon/doors/fleshy_orifice_closed.png.description: A fleshy organic oval orifice in a skin-toned membrane texture, resembling a closed biological portal or mouth-like dungeon entrance.

dungeon/doors/gate_closed_left.png.description: The left panel of a large closed wooden gate with a dark stone archway frame, featuring vertical brown wood planks and horizontal golden-tan crossbars.

dungeon/doors/gate_closed_middle.png.description: The middle section of a large closed wooden gate with vertical brown wood planks and two horizontal golden-tan reinforcement bars spanning the width.

dungeon/doors/gate_closed_right.png.description: The right panel of a large closed wooden gate with a dark stone archway frame, featuring vertical brown wood planks and horizontal golden-tan crossbars.

dungeon/doors/gate_open_left.png.description: The left panel of an open gate showing a dark stone archway frame with an empty black passage interior, indicating the gate has been opened.

dungeon/doors/gate_open_middle.png.description: A large wooden double-door gate shown open, with dark brown wooden panels and a stone archway frame, representing the middle section of a tall open gate structure with doors swung to the sides.

dungeon/doors/gate_open_right.png.description: The right panel of an open gate with a dark stone archway frame and empty black interior, showing the passage is accessible.

dungeon/doors/gate_runed_left.png.description: The left panel of a runed gate featuring brown wood planks with glowing blue magical rune inscriptions across the middle band and blue-lit stone archway corners.

dungeon/doors/gate_runed_middle.png.description: The middle section of a runed wooden gate adorned with a continuous band of glowing blue diamond-pattern rune inscriptions across the center of the brown wood planks.

dungeon/doors/gate_runed_right.png.description: The right panel of a runed gate with brown wood planks featuring glowing blue magical rune inscriptions in the middle band and blue-illuminated stone archway corners.

dungeon/doors/gate_sealed_left.png.description: The left panel of a sealed gate with a bright green glowing frame outlining the stone archway and green grid-patterned wooden planks, indicating a magically sealed entrance.

dungeon/doors/gate_sealed_middle.png.description: The middle section of a sealed gate displaying bright green glowing wood planks in a grid pattern, indicating the gate is magically locked or impassable.

dungeon/doors/gate_sealed_right.png.description: The right panel of a sealed gate with a bright green glowing stone archway frame and green grid-patterned wooden planks, completing the sealed gate visual.

dungeon/doors/open_door.png.description: An open wooden door set within a dark stone archway, with the brown paneled door swung open to the right, revealing passage through the doorway.

dungeon/doors/runed_door.png.description: A single runed door tile with a stone archway, brown vertical wood planks, and a band of glowing blue diamond-pattern rune markings in the lower portion.

dungeon/doors/sealed_door.png.description: A sealed door depicted as a bright green glowing portcullis or barred gate with an arched top, set against a stone border, indicating it cannot be opened.

dungeon/doors/vgate_closed_down.png.description: The bottom section of a closed vertical portcullis gate, showing dark brown horizontal wooden planks with vertical golden bar reinforcements, set in a stone frame.

dungeon/doors/vgate_closed_middle.png.description: The middle section of a closed vertical portcullis gate, displaying dark brown horizontal wooden planks with vertical golden bar reinforcements forming the main body of the gate.

dungeon/doors/vgate_closed_up.png.description: The top section of a closed vertical portcullis gate, showing dark brown horizontal wooden planks with vertical golden bar reinforcements and a stone border at the top edge.

dungeon/doors/vgate_open_down.png.description: The bottom section of an open vertical portcullis gate, showing a dark/empty passage below with only a small portion of brown wooden gate visible at the lower edge.

dungeon/doors/vgate_open_middle.png.description: The middle section of an open vertical portcullis gate, showing a completely dark open passage with stone borders on the sides, indicating the gate has been raised.

dungeon/doors/vgate_open_up.png.description: The top section of an open vertical portcullis gate, showing the raised brown wooden gate with golden bars retracted at the top of the frame, with open darkness below.

dungeon/doors/vgate_runed_down.png.description: The bottom section of a runed vertical portcullis gate, featuring dark brown wooden planks with golden vertical bars overlaid with glowing blue rune markings.

dungeon/doors/vgate_runed_middle.png.description: The middle section of a runed vertical portcullis gate, displaying brown wooden planks with golden bars and prominent blue runic symbols inscribed across the gate's surface.

dungeon/doors/vgate_runed_up.png.description: The top section of a runed vertical portcullis gate, showing brown wooden planks with golden vertical bars and blue runic inscriptions, with a stone border at the top.

dungeon/doors/vgate_sealed_down.png.description: The bottom section of a sealed vertical portcullis gate, featuring brown wooden planks with golden bars overlaid with bright green glowing rune or seal markings indicating it is magically locked.

dungeon/doors/vgate_sealed_middle.png.description: The middle section of a sealed vertical portcullis gate, displaying brown wooden horizontal planks with golden vertical bars and vivid green glowing rune markings covering the surface.

dungeon/doors/vgate_sealed_up.png.description: The top section of a sealed vertical portcullis gate, showing brown wooden planks with golden vertical bars and vivid green glowing rune markings, with a stone border at the top.

dungeon/floor/sigil_circle.png.description: A bright yellow circular ring drawn on a dark reddish-brown floor tile, representing the circle component of a magical sigil or rune marking.

dungeon/floor/sigil_cross.png.description: A bright yellow cross or plus symbol centered on a dark reddish-brown floor tile, forming a four-directional line intersection used as a magical sigil marking.

dungeon/floor/sigil_curve_north_east.png.description: A bright yellow curved arc on a dark reddish-brown floor tile, depicting the north-east portion of a circular curve that opens downward-left, part of a multi-tile sigil pattern.

dungeon/floor/sigil_curve_south_east.png.description: A bright yellow curved arc on a dark reddish-brown floor tile, depicting the south-east portion of a circular curve that opens upward-left, part of a multi-tile sigil pattern.

dungeon/floor/sigil_curve_south_west.png.description: A bright yellow curved arc on a dark reddish-brown floor tile, depicting the south-west portion of a circular curve that opens upward-right, mirroring the south-east curve as part of a multi-tile sigil.

dungeon/floor/sigils/y-shaped_north.png.description: A yellow Y-shaped sigil on a dark floor with the single stem pointing downward (north-facing), rendered as a simple three-pronged geometric outline.

dungeon/floor/sigils/y-shaped_right.png.description: A yellow Y-shaped sigil on a dark floor with the fork angled to the right side, rendered as a simple three-pronged geometric outline.

dungeon/floor/sigils/y-shaped_south.png.description: A yellow Y-shaped sigil on a dark floor with the single stem pointing upward (south-facing), rendered as a simple three-pronged geometric outline.

dungeon/floor/sigils/y-shaped_west.png.description: A yellow Y-shaped sigil on a dark floor with the single stem extending to the left (west-facing), rendered as a simple three-pronged geometric outline.

dungeon/gateways/abyssal_stair.png.description: A glowing magenta and purple gothic arch portal filled with deep purple light and descending steps, representing a mystical staircase entrance to the Abyss.

dungeon/gateways/bailey_gone.png.description: A deactivated or spent bailey portal depicted as a red crescent axe-like icon and a wooden staff leaning together, indicating the portal is gone.

dungeon/gateways/bazaar_gone.png.description: A deactivated bazaar portal depicted as a plain stone archway with no contents, indicating the portal has closed.

dungeon/gateways/bazaar_portal.png.description: An active bazaar portal showing a stone arch framing a nighttime scene with a dark castle silhouette, glowing torches, and a moonlit sky, representing entry to the bazaar.

dungeon/gateways/branch_stairs.png.description: A stone-textured staircase tile showing worn grey stone steps used to enter a dungeon branch.

dungeon/gateways/enter.png.description: A golden yellow arched entrance tile with bright gold-colored stonework framing a dark interior opening, representing a generic dungeon entry point.

dungeon/gateways/enter_abyss.png.description: An Abyss portal entrance featuring a dark stone arch covered in skull motifs, with a pitch-black interior suggesting entry into the chaotic Abyss realm.

dungeon/gateways/enter_abyss_1.png.description: A dark archway filled with purple smoky tendrils and glowing pink face-like shapes, flanked by magenta pillars, depicting a chaotic entrance to the Abyss.

dungeon/gateways/enter_abyss_2.png.description: A dark archway filled with purple smoky tendrils and glowing pink skull-like shapes, flanked by magenta pillars, depicting a second variant of the chaotic Abyss entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_abyss_3.png.description: A dark archway filled with purple smoky tendrils and glowing pink face-like shapes on a slightly different arrangement, flanked by magenta pillars, depicting a third variant of the Abyss entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_cocytus.png.description: A Cocytus portal entrance showing a dark stone arch with skull decorations and a swirling blue icy aura within, representing the frozen hell branch.

dungeon/gateways/enter_cocytus_1.png.description: An arched red-framed gateway portal with flanking torches and a silver chain ornament at the top, filled with a swirling blue icy pattern of crossing diagonal lines suggesting a frozen underworld entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_cocytus_2.png.description: An arched red-framed gateway portal with flanking torches and a silver chain ornament at the top, filled with a swirling blue icy pattern of crossing diagonal lines suggesting a frozen underworld entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_cocytus_3.png.description: An arched red-framed gateway portal with flanking torches and a silver chain ornament at the top, filled with a darker blue swirling icy pattern of diagonal streaks suggesting an alternate frozen underworld entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_crypt.png.description: A Crypt portal entrance depicted as a gothic stone arch with ornate stonework and fiery orange torches flanking a dark interior, representing entry to the undead Crypt branch.

dungeon/gateways/enter_depths.png.description: A stone archway portal with two red glowing eyes flanking the arch and a dark void interior, representing the entrance to the Depths dungeon branch.

dungeon/gateways/enter_dis.png.description: A dark stone doorway framed by grey brick walls with a shadowed interior recess, representing the entrance to Dis, the iron city of Hell.

dungeon/gateways/enter_dis_1.png.description: An arched red-framed gateway portal with flanking torches and a silver chain ornament at the top, filled with a bright green glowing circuit-like or rune-inscribed rectangular pattern suggesting an iron city entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_dis_2.png.description: An arched red-framed gateway portal with flanking torches and a silver chain ornament at the top, filled with a darker green glowing rune or circuit-like rectangular pattern suggesting an alternate iron city entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_dis_3.png.description: An arched red-framed gateway portal with flanking torches and a silver chain ornament at the top, filled with a muted green rectangular circuit-like pattern, a third variant of the iron city entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_gehenna.png.description: A stone archway portal filled with red flames burning in a dark void, representing the entrance to Gehenna, the fiery Hell branch.

dungeon/gateways/enter_gehenna_1.png.description: An arched red-framed gateway portal with flanking torches and a silver chain ornament at the top, filled with a glowing orange-red fiery swirling pattern suggesting a volcanic hellfire entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_gehenna_2.png.description: An arched red-framed gateway portal with flanking torches and a silver chain ornament at the top, filled with a bright red-orange fiery swirling pattern, a second variant of the volcanic hellfire entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_gehenna_3.png.description: An arched red-framed gateway portal with flanking torches and a silver chain ornament at the top, filled with a deep crimson and orange fiery swirling pattern, a third variant of the volcanic hellfire entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_hell.png.description: A grinning skeletal face with red glowing eyes on a dark background flanked by white bone-like structures, representing the entrance to Hell.

dungeon/gateways/enter_hell_2.png.description: An arched dark stone gateway portal with flanking torches and a golden demonic face ornament at the top, filled with a black interior with a slightly more visible red glow at the bottom, a second variant of the Hell entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_hell_3.png.description: An arched dark stone gateway portal with flanking torches and a golden demonic face ornament at the top, filled with a dark interior with a reddish glow, a third variant of the Hell entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_labyrinth.png.description: A grey stone arched doorway with a lighter stone interior suggesting depth, representing the entrance to the Labyrinth.

dungeon/gateways/enter_lair.png.description: A large yellow-green gourd or pumpkin-like plant with curling green vines, representing the entrance to the Lair of Beasts.

dungeon/gateways/enter_snake.png.description: A glowing green-outlined archway with a red gem at the apex descending into a dark perspective corridor, representing the entrance to the Snake Pit.

dungeon/gateways/enter_spider.png.description: A triangular archway portal framed by purple/pink draped fabric with a black checkered pattern interior, suggesting a spider-themed dungeon entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_tartarus.png.description: A stone archway doorway with green mossy or smoky vegetation filling the interior passage, representing the entrance to Tartarus.

dungeon/gateways/enter_tartarus_1.png.description: A gothic arch portal with a red stone frame flanked by orange flame torches, filled with a teal maze-like labyrinthine pattern, representing the first Tartarus entrance variant.

dungeon/gateways/enter_tartarus_2.png.description: A gothic arch portal with a red stone frame flanked by orange flame torches, filled with a teal swirling maze pattern, representing the second Tartarus entrance variant.

dungeon/gateways/enter_tartarus_3.png.description: A gothic arch portal with a dark red stone frame flanked by flame torches, filled with a teal labyrinth pattern, representing the third Tartarus entrance variant.

dungeon/gateways/enter_tomb.png.description: A golden arch portal with a blue gemstone at the top, gold chainmail-like borders, and a stone rubble floor below, representing the entrance to the Tomb of the Ancients.

dungeon/gateways/enter_vaults_closed.png.description: A circular stone vault door with a metal cross-bar locking mechanism, representing the closed entrance to the Vaults.

dungeon/gateways/enter_vaults_open.png.description: A dark circular portal set into a stone wall with a metallic, reflective black interior and silver rim, suggesting an open vault entrance.

dungeon/gateways/enter_zot_closed_old.pn.description: A golden-framed portal with dark red/brown wooden doors barred shut by a horizontal metal bar, surrounded by a yellow jagged border with red glowing eyes at the top, in an older art style.

dungeon/gateways/enter_zot_open_new.png.description: An ornate golden archway with a 'Z' symbol at the top and purple crystalline decorations on the pillars, leading into a dark purple corridor - the open Zot entrance portal.

dungeon/gateways/enter_zot_open_old.png.description: An open Zot portal in old style showing the same golden jagged border with red eyes at top, but with the doors open revealing a dark red interior passage.

dungeon/gateways/entrance.png.description: A stone archway entrance set into a grey brick wall with a dark black interior, representing a generic dungeon entrance with no special markings.

dungeon/gateways/escape_hatch_down.png.description: A square orange-brown trapdoor hatch set into the floor with a central diamond-shaped handle, used to descend to a lower level.

dungeon/gateways/escape_hatch_up.png.description: An open orange-brown trapdoor hatch with a chain-link pattern on the raised door panel, used to ascend to an upper level.

dungeon/gateways/exit.png.description: A stone archway exit set into a grey brick wall with a bright golden four-pointed star burst glowing in the dark passage interior.

dungeon/gateways/exit_abyss_flickering_n.description: A glowing pink-magenta pointed arch portal with a bright white-yellow core light and soft radiant glow, representing the flickering exit from the Abyss.

dungeon/gateways/exit_abyss_flickering_o.description: A stone archway with a blue-glowing interior containing a golden four-pointed star, representing a flickering Abyss exit portal in old style.

dungeon/gateways/exit_abyss_new.png.description: A glowing pink-magenta pointed arch portal with a bright white core and soft radiant glow on a dark background, representing the standard exit from the Abyss.

dungeon/gateways/exit_abyss_old.png.description: A stone archway with a bright blue glowing interior and a golden four-pointed star burst, representing a stable Abyss exit portal in old art style.

dungeon/gateways/transit_pandemonium_old.description: A glowing blue oval portal with a swirling purple interior, representing a transit gateway to Pandemonium in an older visual style.

dungeon/statues/crumbled_column_6.png.description: A nearly completely crumbled stone column stub with rubble scattered at the base and only a small fragment of shaft remaining.

item/weapon/artefact/spwpn_staff_of_olgr.description: A green glowing staff adorned with bright green skeletal or leaf-like organic decorations, representing the Staff of Olgreb with a poison theme.

item/weapon/artefact/spwpn_sword_of_cere.description: A dramatic curved demon sword with a red and white blade and flowing red accent, the new design for the Sword of Cerebov with a fiery demonic appearance.
A red and white straight sword with bold red striping along the blade, the older design variant of the Sword of Cerebov.

item/weapon/artefact/spwpn_sword_of_powe.description: A large broadsword with a dark blade bearing a bold red blood-streak pattern and golden crossguard and pommel, the new design for the Sword of Power.
A red and white striped sword angled diagonally with an orange hilt, the older design for the Sword of Power.

item/weapon/artefact/spwpn_sword_of_zong.description: A plain grey straight sword with a simple crossguard, depicted diagonally on a dark background.
A grey metallic short sword with a crossguard forming a four-pointed star or cross shape, representing the Sword of Zonguldrok with an undead/necromantic theme.
A plain silver straight sword with a simple crossguard, the older and more subdued design for the Sword of Zonguldrok.

item/weapon/artefact/spwpn_vampires_toot.description: A curved fang-like dagger or short sword with a white/grey blade edged in red, resembling a vampire's tooth, set against a dark background.

item/weapon/artefact/spwpn_wrath_of_trog.description: A large blood-red double-headed axe with a red handle, looking brutal and gore-stained, angled diagonally.
A large double-headed battle axe with red bladed heads and a brown wooden haft, emitting dark smoke wisps  the new version of Trog's Wrath.
A large double-headed battle axe with red bladed heads and a brown wooden haft, styled similarly to its newer counterpart  the old version of Trog's Wrath.

item/weapon/artefact/spwpn_wucad_mu_new..description: A blue war hammer or maul with a deep blue head and blue haft casting dark shadow wisps, representing the new version of Wucad Mu.

item/weapon/artefact/spwpn_wucad_mu_old..description: A blue war hammer with a stocky blue head and blue handle casting dark shadow wisps, representing the old version of Wucad Mu.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_arc_blade.png.description: A glowing cyan/light-blue jagged sword with a crackling electric arc appearance and red hilt, angled diagonally.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_arga_new.png.description: A silvery-blue double-headed axe with curved blades and a grey shaft, representing the new version of the artefact Arga.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_arga_old.png.description: A white and grey double-headed war axe with a pink/magenta handle, representing the old version of the artefact Arga.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_axe_of_woe.pn.description: A large dark-red double-headed axe with ornate swirling rune-like engravings on the blade and an orange-brown haft, representing the Axe of Woe.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_bloodbane_new.description: A deep red long sword or falchion with a dark blade and simple crossguard, casting a shadow  the new version of Bloodbane.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_bloodbane_old.description: A black-and-white checkered longsword with a dark handle, depicting the old version of Bloodbane in a stark monochrome pattern.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_blowgun.png.description: A slender white and gold blowgun or tube weapon, lying diagonally, representing the unique artefact blowgun Botono or similar ranged weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_botono.png.description: A thin red-shafted blowgun or dart tube with a dark fitting at one end, lying diagonally  the artefact Botono.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_brilliance.pn.description: A circular golden gear-like disc with an intricate pattern mounted on a thin rod, resembling a sun wheel or radiant mace head with ornate detail.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_chilly_death_.description: A blue-purple dagger with a red crossguard and dark swirling shadow or wind effect around the blade, suggesting cold magical enchantment.
A large dark blue blade covered in bright cyan and magenta diamond-shaped ice crystal patterns, glowing with cold magical energy.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_crystal_spear.description: A large glowing blue crystal spear with a crystal-like blade and dark handle, emanating a bright cyan magical aura.
A bright green spear or crystal lance with a sharp elongated point and glowing green energy, depicted at a diagonal angle.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_cutlass_new.p.description: A cutlass with a silver curved blade and ornate golden basket hilt guard, depicted diagonally with a dark shadow beneath.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_cutlass_old.p.description: A broad silver longsword with a golden crossguard and decorative hilt, shown diagonally with a strong shadow effect.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_doom_knight_n.description: A dark grey two-handed sword with demonic wing-shaped crossguard and a red jewel at the center, exuding a sinister shadowy appearance.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_doom_knight_o.description: A pale blue longsword with a dark red crossguard, glowing with icy blue light and a subtle shadow beneath the blade.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_elemental.png.description: A grey staff or wand with a square bracket-shaped tip, depicted diagonally suggesting a reaching or elemental magical implement.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_eos.png.description: A purple and silver mace or star-shaped flail head with spiky protrusions, attached to a purple-tipped shaft with a shadow beneath.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_finisher.png.description: A dark wooden crossbow or composite bow depicted diagonally, with a minimal dark-toned pixel art style suggesting a ranged weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_firestarter.p.description: A dark mace or torch-like weapon with a blazing orange-red fiery glow at the head, casting warm light on a dark handle.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_flaming_death.description: A golden short sword with a red gem crossguard surrounded by bright golden-yellow flame or light effects radiating outward.
A crossed pair of red-and-gold swords or blades arranged in an X pattern with bright red ember-like spots and a fiery glow, representing a flaming death artefact.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_guard_new.png.description: A grey serrated short sword or falchion with a purple hilt, accompanied by a brown wooden stake or secondary weapon beside it.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_guard_old.png.description: A slender golden spear or javelin with an orange-yellow shaft and a pointed metal tip, depicted diagonally against a dark background.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_gyre.png.description: A pair of golden rings connected by chains, with colorful gem-like accents in blue, red, and green, and two curved golden blades extending outward, forming a dual-blade weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_hellfire.png.description: A crossbow-like weapon with a red and gold ornate frame, topped with a bright orange flame, suggesting a fire-enchanted ranged weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_jihad_new.png.description: A blue-bladed longsword with a golden crossguard and handle, gleaming with an icy blue sheen indicating magical enchantment.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_jihad_old.png.description: A classic longsword with a bright blue blade, golden crossguard, and blue handle, radiating magical energy with a blue aura.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_katana.png.description: A slender curved katana with a silver blade and dark brown handle, styled as a traditional Japanese sword rendered in pixel art.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_knife_of_accu.description: A small dagger or knife with a silver blade and a pink/magenta jeweled handle, depicted at a diagonal angle.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_krishna_new.p.description: An ornate golden curved weapon resembling a sickle or hook-blade, with an elaborate decorative gold handle and trailing arc shape.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_krishna_old.p.description: A large golden decorative bow rendered in pixel art with an elaborate curving gold frame, depicted vertically without a bowstring.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_leech.png.description: A golden broadsword with a wide gold blade, brown handle, and prominent crossguard, depicted diagonally as a heavy melee weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_morg.png.description: A fiery curved sword or scimitar with an orange-red blade that appears to be ablaze, with a darker brown crossguard and handle.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_octopus_king..description: A red spiked club or mace with a crimson head covered in sharp spines and a thin red shaft, suggesting a demonic or cursed weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_order.png.description: A glowing blue cross-shaped sword with white star-burst sparkle effects radiating from the center, depicting a magical lawful weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_piercer_new.p.description: A dark feathered or wing-shaped projectile weapon  a sleek black crossbow or bow with dark flowing feather-like limbs, suggesting a piercing ranged weapon (new version).

item/weapon/artefact/urand_piercer_old.p.description: A pale grey-white serpentine or twisted bolt shape with a silvery metallic sheen, depicting an older version of the piercer artefact ranged weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_plutonium_new.description: A large glowing green crystal sword or blade with bright emerald magical energy, mounted on a dark hilt, angled diagonally.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_plutonium_old.description: A glowing cyan-blue longsword with a bright electric-blue blade emitting light, representing the old Plutonium Sword artefact with a vivid neon hue.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_punk.png.description: A bright blue and orange coiled whip or flail with a dotted pixel pattern, depicting a punk-style unique weapon in vivid contrasting colors.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_serpent_scour.description: A dark coiled whip or scourge with a brown leather handle, depicted as a looping serpentine flail weapon in muted grey-brown tones.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_shillelagh.pn.description: A dark wooden club or shillelagh with a rounded head, depicted in plain dark brown tones as a simple but heavy bludgeoning weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_skullcrusher..description: A red spiked mace or flail with bright crimson and white crystal-like spikes erupting from a dark handle, depicting a brutal crushing weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_snakebite.png.description: A dark coiled snake-shaped whip or chain weapon with a small green-tipped dagger at one end, rendered in dark grey and black.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_sniper.png.description: A black crossbow with a white string and dark metal body, depicted as a sleek ranged weapon artefact known as the Sniper.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_spriggans_kni.description: A small multi-colored dagger with a purple blade and green crossguard, depicting the new version of the Spriggan's Knife artefact in vibrant fantasy colors.
A short golden-yellow dagger with a dark red or maroon handle, depicting the old version of the Spriggan's Knife artefact in warm metallic tones.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_storm_bow.png.description: A glowing cyan-blue shortbow with a gold or tan string, depicted with bright magical light effects suggesting an enchanted ranged weapon.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_undeadhunter..description: A unique artefact weapon depicted as a silver cross-shaped star/shuriken ornament atop a sword hilt with a glowing blue rune or sigil at the base, styled as a holy undead-hunting blade.

item/weapon/artefact/urand_wyrmbane_new..description: A long sword with a vivid green serrated or scaled blade and a dark handle with a gold crossguard, styled as a dragon-slaying artefact weapon (Wyrmbane, new version).

item/weapon/artefact/urand_wyrmbane_old..description: An older variant of the Wyrmbane artefact sword with a bright green blade, dark handle, and gold crossguard, slightly different proportions from the new version.

item/weapon/ranged/arbalest_1.png.description: A brown wooden arbalest crossbow with a dark metal mechanism and stock, depicted in a compact crossed-bow style.

item/weapon/ranged/arbalest_2.png.description: A golden-orange arbalest crossbow with ornate wooden construction and metallic detailing, shown in a crossed-bow pose.

item/weapon/ranged/arbalest_3.png.description: A blue and silver arbalest crossbow with a metallic frame, gold accents, and a compact body, depicted in crossed-bow style.

item/weapon/ranged/blowgun_1.png.description: A magenta-pink blowgun depicted as a single elongated tube, simple and slender in design.

item/weapon/ranged/blowgun_2.png.description: A magenta/pink cylindrical blowgun with gold ring accents, depicted diagonally in pixel art style.

item/weapon/ranged/bow_1.png.description: A golden recurve bow with a taut string, shown in classic pixel art style with warm yellow tones.

item/weapon/ranged/bow_2.png.description: A reddish-brown recurve bow with orange accents and a taut string, slightly more angular than the first bow variant.

item/weapon/ranged/crossbow_1.png.description: A large brown fan-shaped crossbow with a wide curved prod and decorative gold trim, viewed from a top-down angle.

item/weapon/ranged/crossbow_2.png.description: A brown and gold crossbow with a prominent curved prod and detailed wooden stock, slightly different proportions from the first variant.

item/weapon/ranged/elven_arrow.png.description: A slender arrow with a white arrowhead and green fletching at the tail, angled diagonally on a dark background.

item/weapon/ranged/greatsling.png.description: A grey and tan greatsling with a wide leather pouch and rope ties, depicted diagonally with a large frame.

item/weapon/ranged/greatsling_2.png.description: A gold and brown ornate greatsling with a decorative frame and leather pouch, a fancier variant of the greatsling.

item/weapon/ranged/hand_crossbow.png.description: A compact brown and gold hand crossbow with a pistol-style grip and small prod, shown at a diagonal angle.

item/weapon/ranged/hand_crossbow_2.png.description: A red and gold hand crossbow with decorative red accents on the stock and trigger mechanism, a more ornate variant.

item/weapon/ranged/hand_crossbow_3.png.description: A brown and tan hand crossbow with an intricate mechanical design and multiple small components, a third variant with a busier silhouette.

item/weapon/ranged/longbow.png.description: A large elegant longbow in deep red and gold with a graceful curved limb, shown at a diagonal angle.

item/weapon/ranged/longbow_1.png.description: A sleek golden longbow with a slim profile and subtle gradient shading, a brighter and more slender variant than the first longbow.

item/weapon/ranged/longbow_2.png.description: A crescent-shaped longbow rendered in bright yellow-gold with a dark brown wooden grip, depicted diagonally in pixel art style.

item/weapon/ranged/longbow_3.png.description: A longbow with a golden arc and dark grip, shown with a silver arrow nocked and ready to fire, rendered at a diagonal angle.

item/weapon/ranged/needle-c.png.description: A short blowgun needle with a grey metallic tip and red-tipped tail, oriented diagonally.

item/weapon/ranged/orcish_arrow.png.description: An orcish arrow with a red arrowhead and red fletching, with a dark shaft angled diagonally.

item/weapon/ranged/rock_new.png.description: A roughly square chunk of brown rock with light and dark shading, depicted as a throwable stone projectile.

item/weapon/ranged/rock_old.png.description: An irregularly shaped dark brownish-orange rock or clump of dirt, serving as an old-style throwing rock projectile.

item/weapon/ranged/shortbow_1.png.description: A golden shortbow with a simple curved frame and no string visible, oriented diagonally on a dark background.

item/weapon/ranged/shortbow_2.png.description: A golden shortbow with a curved frame and a black bowstring, shown at a diagonal angle with ornate styling.

item/weapon/ranged/shortbow_3.png.description: A blue-and-silver shortbow with a curved frame and metallic sheen, displayed diagonally in pixel art style.

item/weapon/ranged/silver_arrow.png.description: A silver arrow with a bright white arrowhead and white fletching, with a grey shaft angled diagonally.

item/weapon/ranged/silver_tomahawk.png.description: A blue-handled silver tomahawk hatchet with a gleaming white blade edge, rendered diagonally as a thrown weapon.

item/weapon/ranged/sling_1.png.description: A sling weapon with a golden cord and dark leather pouch resting on a small base, depicted in a loose coiled arrangement.

item/weapon/ranged/sling_2.png.description: An orange-outlined sling with a dark leather body and golden cord detail, shown resting in a coiled pose with a small rounded pouch.

item/weapon/ranged/sling_bullet_1_new.pn.description: A smooth dark grey spherical sling bullet with subtle shading, representing a new-style lead or stone shot.

item/weapon/ranged/sling_bullet_1_old.pn.description: A slightly smaller dark grey round sling bullet with minimal detail, representing an old-style stone or lead shot.

item/weapon/ranged/sling_bullet_2_new.pn.description: A dark spherical sling bullet with a glowing orange crosshatch pattern on its surface, indicating a special or branded ammunition type.

item/weapon/ranged/sling_bullet_2_old.pn.description: A dark round sling bullet with a bright yellow crosshatch brand pattern, representing an enchanted or special old-style sling shot.

item/weapon/ranged/steel_tomahawk.png.description: A steel tomahawk throwing axe with a bright red-wrapped handle and shiny silver blade, depicted diagonally on a dark background.

item/weapon/ranged/stone_new.png.description: A rough brown stone or clump of dirt, depicted as a small irregularly shaped dark brown mass used as a throwing projectile.

item/weapon/ranged/stone_old.png.description: A smooth round grey stone depicted as a simple spherical projectile for throwing.

item/weapon/ranged/throwing_net.png.description: A bright yellow throwing net with a diamond mesh pattern, shown spread open mid-flight as a ranged trapping weapon.

item/weapon/ranged/tomahawk_1.png.description: A pair of wooden-handled tomahawks with silver blades arranged diagonally, representing a stack of throwing tomahawks.

item/weapon/ranged/tomahawk_2.png.description: A single tomahawk with a red-wrapped wooden handle and gold-tipped blade shown at a diagonal angle, an alternate throwing axe sprite.

misc/cursor.png.description: A pixel art UI cursor displayed as four yellow corner brackets forming an open square frame, used to indicate a targeted tile on the game map.

misc/cursor_green.png.description: A pixel art UI cursor displayed as a solid green filled square, used to indicate a selected or highlighted tile on the game map.

misc/cursor_red.png.description: A pixel art UI cursor displayed as a red crosshair or plus-sign shape, used to indicate a hostile target or danger selection on the game map.

misc/damage_meter_almost_dead.png.description: A thin horizontal health bar rendered almost entirely in dark/black with only a small red segment remaining at the left, indicating near-death status.

misc/damage_meter_heavily_damaged.png.description: A thin horizontal health bar with a small orange segment on a dark background, indicating heavy damage with very little health remaining.

misc/damage_meter_lightly_damaged.png.description: A thin horizontal health bar with a long green segment on a dark background, indicating light damage with most health remaining.

misc/damage_meter_moderately_damaged.png.description: A thin horizontal health bar with a moderate yellow-green segment on a dark background, indicating moderate damage.

misc/damage_meter_severely_damaged.png.description: A thin horizontal health bar with a small yellow segment on a dark background, indicating severe damage with little health remaining.

misc/error.png.description: A large pixelated cream-colored question mark symbol on a dark background, used as a generic error or unknown state indicator.

misc/halo.png.description: A large glowing circular halo ring rendered in grey/silver outline against a dark background, representing a divine or holy aura effect.

misc/landing.png.description: A solid muted green-grey square tile used as a landing zone or floor overlay indicator.

misc/magicmap.png.description: A solid muted blue-grey square tile used as a magic map overlay or fog-of-war indicator.

misc/mask_deep_water.png.description: A deep water terrain mask tile showing swirling blue glowing patterns with concentric cyan highlights on a dark blue background.

misc/mask_deep_water_murky.png.description: A deep murky water terrain mask tile with swirling green glowing patterns and concentric green highlights, indicating a murky or poisoned water variant.

misc/mask_deep_water_shoals.png.description: A deep shoals water terrain mask tile showing blue-grey swirling water patterns with lighter blue-white highlights, indicating shallow coastal or shoal water.

misc/mask_lava.png.description: A lava terrain mask tile with vivid red and orange molten rock patterns glowing brightly, indicating a hazardous lava floor.

misc/mask_shallow_water.png.description: A shallow water terrain mask tile displaying cyan and teal swirling water ripple patterns on a dark background.

misc/mask_shallow_water_murky.png.description: A shallow murky water terrain mask tile with vivid green glowing swirl patterns, indicating murky or contaminated shallow water.

misc/mask_shallow_water_shoals.png.description: A shallow shoals water terrain mask tile showing pale blue-white and grey swirling water patterns indicating very shallow shoal water.

misc/mdam_almost_dead.png.description: A small red warning icon or health indicator strip representing a character or creature that is almost dead, shown as a thin red bar or sliver.

misc/mdam_heavily_damaged.png.description: A horizontal UI status bar showing heavy damage, rendered as a short thick bar in a dark orange/amber color indicating critically low health or severe structural damage.

misc/mdam_lightly_damaged.png.description: A horizontal UI status bar showing light damage, rendered as a longer thick bar in bright green color indicating minor damage or mostly intact condition.

misc/mdam_moderately_damaged.png.description: A horizontal UI status bar showing moderate damage, rendered as a medium-length thick bar in mid-green color indicating partial damage.

misc/mdam_severely_damaged.png.description: A horizontal UI status bar showing severe damage, rendered as a short thick bar in yellow-green color indicating significant damage close to destruction.

misc/mold_glowing_1.png.description: A small cluster of bright green glowing mold spores or fungal growth on a dark background, variant 1 of an animated set.

misc/mold_glowing_2.png.description: A small cluster of bright green glowing mold spores or fungal growth on a dark background, variant 2 with slightly different spore arrangement.

misc/mold_glowing_3.png.description: A small cluster of bright green glowing mold spores or fungal growth on a dark background, variant 3 with a denser spore pattern.

misc/mold_glowing_4.png.description: A small cluster of bright green glowing mold spores or fungal growth on a dark background, variant 4 with the sparsest arrangement of the set.

misc/out_of_range.png.description: A dark grey rectangular block overlay on a darker background, representing a tile or target that is outside the player's attack range.

misc/out_of_sight_new.png.description: A medium grey rectangular overlay tile indicating a map area currently out of the player's sight but previously visited (new style).

misc/out_of_sight_old.png.description: A slightly lighter grey rectangular overlay tile indicating a map area out of the player's sight, rendered in the older visual style.

misc/ray.png.description: A white pixel-art question mark symbol on a dark background, representing an unknown or unidentified ray effect in the game UI.

misc/ray_out_of_range.png.description: A rounded square outline drawn with dashed teal/green pixels on a dark background, indicating a targeting reticle or out-of-range area marker for a ray ability.

misc/sensed_monster_easy.png.description: A small pixelated circular smiley face icon in brown/tan with a smug or neutral expression, indicating a sensed monster of easy difficulty.

misc/sensed_monster_friendly.png.description: A small pixelated circular smiley face icon in bright green with a friendly smile, indicating a sensed monster that is friendly or allied.

misc/sensed_monster_nasty.png.description: A small pixelated circular face icon in deep red with menacing eyebrows, fangs, and a sinister grin, indicating a sensed monster that is particularly dangerous.

misc/sensed_monster_tough.png.description: A glowing yellow smiley face with sharp fangs and angry eyes, indicating a sensed but unseen dangerous monster nearby.

misc/sensed_monster_trivial.png.description: A muted grey smiley face with a neutral expression, indicating a sensed but unseen trivial or weak monster nearby.

misc/slot.png.description: A dark charcoal-grey square with a subtle texture and a grey border, representing an empty inventory equipment slot.

misc/slot_cursed.png.description: A dark square with a red border, representing an empty inventory slot containing a cursed item.

misc/slot_equipped.png.description: A solid green textured square representing an equipped inventory slot with an item currently worn or wielded.

misc/slot_equipped_cursed.png.description: A solid red textured square representing an inventory slot with a cursed item that is currently equipped.

misc/slot_melded.png.description: A solid yellow textured square representing an inventory slot where an item has been melded into the character's form.

misc/slot_vehumet.png.description: A solid cyan or light-blue textured square with a grey border, representing a slot dedicated to Vehumet spell offerings.

misc/stab_brand.png.description: A flat olive-green tile used as a background or brand overlay, associated with stab attack effects in the dungeon.

misc/suppressed.png.description: A flat dark olive-green tile used as a background or suppressed-state overlay in the dungeon.

misc/todo.png.description: A placeholder tile displaying the text 'TODO' in large blocky tan letters on a dark background, used for missing or unfinished sprites.

misc/travel_exclusion_center_new.png.description: A dark reddish-brown X-shaped exclusion marker with bold diagonal triangles forming a cross pattern, representing the center of a travel exclusion zone (new style).

misc/travel_exclusion_center_old.png.description: A muted dark reddish-brown X-shaped exclusion marker with slightly smaller diagonal triangles, representing the center of a travel exclusion zone (old style).

misc/travel_exclusion_new.png.description: A dark reddish-brown X-shaped border tile with diagonal triangle segments forming an exclusion boundary marker (new style), slightly lighter than the center variant.

misc/travel_exclusion_old.png.description: A dark reddish-brown X-shaped border tile with diagonal triangle segments forming an exclusion boundary marker (old style), with a more muted tone.

misc/travel_path_from_1.png.description: A small set of golden-yellow dotted footstep markers arranged diagonally from lower-left to upper-right, indicating travel path direction 1 (northeast).

misc/travel_path_from_2.png.description: A small cluster of golden-yellow dotted footstep markers arranged in a short diagonal arc, indicating travel path direction 2.

misc/travel_path_from_3.png.description: A small set of golden-yellow dotted footstep markers arranged in a shallow diagonal curve pointing upper-right, indicating travel path direction 3.

misc/travel_path_from_4.png.description: A small cluster of golden-yellow dotted footstep markers arranged in a nearly horizontal arc curving right, indicating travel path direction 4.

misc/travel_path_from_5.png.description: A small set of golden-yellow dotted footstep markers arranged in a gentle downward curve to the right, indicating travel path direction 5.

misc/travel_path_from_6.png.description: A small cluster of golden-yellow dotted footstep markers arranged in a shallow diagonal curve pointing lower-right, indicating travel path direction 6.

misc/travel_path_from_7.png.description: A small set of golden-yellow dotted footstep markers arranged in a short diagonal pointing downward-right, indicating travel path direction 7.

misc/travel_path_from_8.png.description: A small cluster of golden-yellow dotted footstep markers arranged diagonally from upper-left to lower-right, indicating travel path direction 8 (southeast).

misc/travel_path_to_1.png.description: A short dotted trail of golden-yellow footstep marks curving upward from the bottom-left, representing step 1 of a travel path overlay on the dungeon map.

misc/travel_path_to_2.png.description: A dotted trail of golden-yellow footstep marks curving upward and to the right, representing step 2 of a travel path overlay.

misc/travel_path_to_3.png.description: A dotted trail of golden-yellow footstep marks arcing across the tile, representing step 3 of a travel path overlay.

misc/travel_path_to_4.png.description: A dotted trail of golden-yellow footstep marks positioned toward the upper-center area, representing step 4 of a travel path overlay.

misc/travel_path_to_5.png.description: A dotted trail of golden-yellow footstep marks in the upper-right region, representing step 5 of a travel path overlay.

misc/travel_path_to_6.png.description: A dotted trail of golden-yellow footstep marks curving toward the right side, representing step 6 of a travel path overlay.

misc/travel_path_to_7.png.description: A dotted trail of golden-yellow footstep marks descending on the right side, representing step 7 of a travel path overlay.

misc/travel_path_to_8.png.description: A dotted trail of golden-yellow footstep marks near the bottom-right, representing step 8 of a travel path overlay.

misc/tried.png.description: A small white question mark on a dark background, indicating an item or ability that has been tried but not yet identified.

misc/tutorial_cursor.png.description: A dark square with a bright yellow border, representing a tutorial cursor or highlighted selection indicator.

misc/unseen_armor_new.png.description: A diamond-shaped UI icon with a purple-pink glowing border containing a white pixel-art demon face or horned mask silhouette, indicating an unseen armour item on the map.

misc/unseen_armor_old.png.description: A pixel art sprite of a heavily armored humanoid figure carrying a barrel, representing old-style unseen armour or a dungeon prop.

misc/unseen_item_new.png.description: A diamond-shaped UI icon with a green glowing border containing a white question mark, indicating an unseen or unidentified item on the map.

misc/unseen_item_old.png.description: A placeholder icon showing a jumbled pile of colored items including a red potion, grey armour, and yellow object, representing an unknown or hidden item on the ground.

misc/unseen_monster.png.description: A plain white silhouette of a humanoid figure standing upright, used as a placeholder to represent an unseen or unknown monster.

misc/unseen_weapon_new.png.description: A diamond-shaped UI icon with a blue glowing border containing a crossed sword and staff silhouette, indicating an unseen weapon on the map.

misc/unseen_weapon_old.png.description: A placeholder icon depicting two crossed weapons - a sword and a staff - in gold and brown, representing an unidentified or hidden weapon.

misc/blood/blood_green_1.png.description: A small splattering of dark green blood on the ground, representing the first variant of green creature blood.

misc/blood/blood_green_2.png.description: A medium-sized splash of dark green blood spread across the ground, the second variant of green creature blood.

misc/brands/bottom_left/demon_pentagram-.description: A red five-pointed pentagram star outline used as a demonic brand overlay for the bottom-left corner of a tile, first animation frame.
An orange-red five-pointed pentagram star outline used as a demonic brand overlay for the bottom-left corner, second animation frame with slightly warmer hue.
An orange five-pointed pentagram star outline used as a demonic brand overlay for the bottom-left corner, third animation frame.
A yellow-orange five-pointed pentagram star outline used as a demonic brand overlay for the bottom-left corner, fourth animation frame.
A yellow five-pointed pentagram star outline used as a demonic brand overlay for the bottom-left corner, fifth animation frame with the brightest/most yellow hue.

misc/brands/bottom_left/demon_pentagram_.description: A small bright red demonic pentagram icon outlined in red pixels, positioned in the bottom-left corner as a brand overlay.
A small orange demonic pentagram brand icon outlined in orange-red pixels, used as a bottom-left corner equipment brand overlay.
A small dark orange demonic pentagram brand icon, slightly lighter orange hue than variant 2, used as a corner brand overlay.
A small yellow-orange demonic pentagram brand icon with a lighter gold-yellow color, used as a bottom-left corner equipment brand.
A small pale yellow-grey demonic pentagram brand icon, the lightest and most muted variant, used as a bottom-left corner brand overlay.

misc/brands/bottom_left/something_under_.description: A small white diagonal striped chevron pattern indicating something is hidden or lurking beneath, used as a bottom-left corner brand overlay.
A white question mark symbol on a dark background, used as a placeholder or unknown indicator overlay.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-acquirement_n.description: An open treasure chest filled with colorful gems and items, rendered in warm brown tones with glittering contents.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-acquirement_o.description: An open brown chest with a sword and golden items spilling out, representing an acquirement reward in an older style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-ambrosia.png.description: A pink cross or plus symbol with a white question mark beside it, indicating an ambrosia or healing brand icon.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-amnesia.png.description: A brown human head silhouette with a red X overlaid on it, representing amnesia or a debuff that removes memory.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-antimagic_new.description: A bottom-right corner brand icon depicting a purple-robed wizard figure with hat and staff, representing the antimagic enchantment on an item.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-antimagic_old.description: A blue-robed wizard figure with a red X crossed over it, indicating the antimagic brand that suppresses spellcasting.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-archery_new.p.description: A bottom-right corner brand icon showing two crossed arrows with a brown bow, representing the archery brand on an item, new style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-archery_old.p.description: A bottom-right corner brand icon depicting a brown/orange bow with a string, representing the archery brand on an item, old style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-archmagi_new..description: A blue-robed wizard holding a staff, depicted in a detailed pixel art style representing the archmagi brand.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-archmagi_old..description: A robed wizard figure in pale blue and purple tones beside a red vertical staff, representing an older archmagi brand icon.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-berserk-rage_.description: An orange and red demonic face with horns and wings, glowing fiercely, representing the berserk rage brand.
A red angular demonic face with glowing eyes and curved horns, representing an older berserk rage brand icon.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-blinking_new..description: A swirling purple and pink circular portal or orb icon with a dark center, representing the blinking teleportation brand.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-blinking_old..description: Two small pink humanoid figures with a white cross between them on a dark background, representing an older blinking brand icon.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-blood_new.png.description: A bright red blood droplet with a glossy highlight, rendered in pixel art style as a bottom-right corner brand overlay for items.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-blood_old.png.description: A small dark red blood droplet with minimal detail, rendered in a muted older style as a bottom-right corner brand overlay.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-brand-weapon..description: A pixel art icon showing a blue-and-gold sword crossed with blue scissors or shears, representing a weapon brand overlay.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-c-teleport_ne.description: A purple ornate spiral symbol with a cross/plus shape overlay in magenta and purple hues, representing a new-style controlled teleport brand.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-c-teleport_ol.description: A purple maze-like or spiral rune symbol representing an older-style controlled teleport brand overlay on items.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-cancel.png.description: A purple circular prohibition symbol with a diagonal line through it, representing a cancel or suppression brand icon.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-chaos_new.png.description: A multicolored rainbow question mark in red, orange, yellow, green, and blue, representing a new-style chaos brand overlay.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-chaos_old.png.description: A pastel rainbow-colored question mark in cyan, yellow, and pink, representing an older-style chaos brand overlay on items.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-coagulated-bl.description: A red blood droplet with a dark X cross over it in brownish-gold, indicating coagulated or dried blood as a new-style item brand.
A small dark red blood droplet alone, representing an older-style coagulated blood brand overlay on items.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-cold-res_new..description: A pixel art shield with a snowflake or cold crystal pattern in grey and white tones, representing a new-style cold resistance brand.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-cold-res_old..description: A golden hexagonal badge with a light blue crystal or snowflake design, representing an older-style cold resistance brand overlay.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-cold_new.png.description: A white and blue crystalline snowflake or ice star shape with sharp pointed tips and a checkerboard pattern, representing a cold brand overlay icon in the new style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-cold_old.png.description: A glowing bright blue orb with radiating light rays, representing a cold brand overlay icon in the old style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-confusion_new.description: An orange cartoon face with a question mark above it, depicting a confused or dazed expression, representing a confusion brand overlay icon in the new style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-confusion_old.description: A yellow circular smiley face with swirling confused eyes and a wavy expression, representing a confusion brand overlay icon in the old style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-curare.png.description: A red-orange pixel art skull icon with a menacing face, representing the curare poison brand overlay for items.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-cure-mutation.description: A red humanoid figure with green X marks on a dark background, representing a cure-mutation brand overlay icon in the new style.
