misc/brands/bottom_right/i-rotten.png.description: A grey circular face with a downturned frown and dot eyes, representing a sickness or rotten brand icon as a sad face emoji in pixel art.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-running.png.description: A green winged foot or hermes-style sandal with golden wings and orange speed lines, representing a running or speed brand icon.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-s-abil.png.description: A gold shield badge with a large downward-pointing red arrow, representing a special ability item brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-s-attr.png.description: A dark shield badge displaying a flame and droplet symbol in blue and orange, representing an attribute-modifying item brand overlay.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-see-invis_new.description: A magenta/purple eye icon surrounded by small diamond sparkles, representing the see-invisible item brand (new version) overlay.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-see-invis_old.description: A small square icon with a grey border containing a blue eye with a white pupil, representing the see invisibility property on an item.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-sickness_new..description: An orange pixelated skull face with dark eye sockets and an open mouth, representing a sickness or disease status brand on an item.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-sickness_old..description: A yellow-green circular smiley face with a neutral flat mouth and dot eyes, representing an older sickness brand icon in pixel art.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-slaying_new.p.description: An orange diagonal sword icon without a background, representing the slaying (attack bonus) brand on an item in the new style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-slaying_old.p.description: A yellow glowing sword on a grey square background, representing the slaying (attack bonus) brand on an item in the old style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-slowing_new.p.description: A dark brown hourglass icon with a red dot and sand, representing the slowing brand on an item in the new style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-slowing_old.p.description: A tan/gold hourglass icon with red sand at the bottom, representing the slowing brand on an item in the old style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-speed_.png.description: A set of blue horizontal motion lines suggesting rapid movement, representing the speed brand on an item in the new style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-speed_new.png.description: An orange downward-pointing chevron or speed stripe with a diagonal sword crossing through it, representing a speed brand icon for weapons.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-speed_old.png.description: A set of golden/orange horizontal motion lines suggesting rapid movement, representing the speed brand on an item in the old style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-spirit_new.pn.description: A blue shield with a diamond pixel pattern and angular blue gem design, representing a spirit brand icon in detailed pixel art.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-spirit_old.pn.description: A blue shield bearing a white snowflake or star burst symbol, representing an older spirit brand icon with a cold or magical motif.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_air_new.description: A grey and white pixelated tornado or whirlwind shape, representing the air staff brand on an item in the new style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_air_old.description: A cyan dotted arc or question-mark-like shape made of small glowing circles, representing the air staff channeling brand in the old style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_channel.description: A orange and purple diamond-shaped orb with swirling gradient bands, representing the channeling staff brand on an item in the new style.
A cyan star-shaped magical glow effect with blue radiant light, representing the channeling staff brand on an item in the old style.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_cold.pn.description: A cyan/light-blue snowflake or star-shaped geometric pattern with crystalline spokes, representing the cold brand overlay for a staff.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_conjura.description: A dark purple explosive burst with jagged flame-like edges pointing upward and to the right, representing the new conjuration brand for a staff.
A solid pink/magenta arrow or bolt shape pointing to the right, representing the old-style conjuration brand for a staff.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_death.p.description: A white skull with red glowing eyes, representing the death brand overlay for a staff.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_earth_n.description: An orange-brown rocky or earthy textured square patch, representing the new earth brand for a staff.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_earth_o.description: Two jagged orange crystal or rock shards pointing upward, representing the old-style earth brand for a staff.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_enchant.description: A green spiral or swirl symbol on dark background, representing the new enchantment brand for a staff.
A bright green rectangular maze-like or meander pattern symbol, representing the old-style enchantment brand for a staff.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_energy_.description: A purple cauldron or pot shape with a dark handle on top, representing the new energy brand for a staff.
A bright yellow starburst or sun shape with radiating points and a hollow center, representing the old-style energy brand for a staff.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_poison..description: A green teardrop or liquid drop shape, representing the poison brand overlay for a staff.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-staff_power.p.description: A solid blue five-pointed star shape, representing the power brand overlay for a staff.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-stealth.png.description: A small pixel art icon depicting crossed lightning bolt-like lines in cyan blue over a grey shadowy figure, representing a stealth brand overlay.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-strength_new..description: A bold pixel art icon showing the yellow text 'STR' in a runic font, representing a new-style strength brand indicator.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-strength_old..description: A pixel art icon showing the text 'STR' in blue letters on a grey square background, representing an old-style strength brand indicator.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-strong-poison.description: A small pixel art icon of a bright green teardrop-shaped vial with a small cross symbol, representing a new-style strong poison brand.
A pixel art icon depicting a red skull face, representing an old-style strong poison or deadly brand indicator.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-summoning.png.description: A pixel art icon showing a red flame or tentacle-like figure rising from a golden yellow circular base, representing a summoning brand.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-sustenance_ne.description: A pixel art icon depicting a round green shape with a small brown stem, resembling food or a fruit, representing a new-style sustenance brand.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-sustenance_ol.description: A pixel art icon showing a bright green lightning bolt-like shape on a grey square background, representing an old-style sustenance brand.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-teleportation.description: A pixel art icon of a purple square spiral pattern, representing a new-style teleportation brand indicator.
A pixel art icon showing a bright magenta/pink starburst or sun shape with radiating lines, representing an old-style teleportation brand indicator.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-torment_new.p.description: A pixel art icon of a white skull face with hollow eyes, representing a new-style torment brand indicator.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-torment_old.p.description: A pixel art icon of a bright pink/magenta skull face, representing an old-style torment brand indicator.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-vampiricism.p.description: A small brown winged demon or bat figure icon with a pointed shape, representing a vampiricism brand icon.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-venom_new.png.description: A small green teardrop-shaped droplet icon with a white highlight, representing a venom poison brand overlay for items.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-venom_old.png.description: A crossed dagger and sword with a magenta/pink droplet below, representing the older venom brand visual for items.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-vorpal.png.description: A bright blue longsword with a golden hilt, depicted diagonally, representing the vorpal brand overlay that enhances cutting damage.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-vulnerability.description: A red shield emblem with a purple diamond sigil in the center, representing the vulnerability brand overlay that reduces enemy resistances.
A small red prohibition/no-entry circle icon with diagonal lines, indicating a vulnerability or debuff status effect overlay positioned at the bottom-right of a tile.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-water.png.description: A bright blue teardrop-shaped water droplet icon, representing the water brand overlay for items.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-wizardry_new..description: A purple-robed wizard figure holding a staff with a purple hat, representing the new wizardry brand overlay for items.

misc/brands/bottom_right/i-wizardry_old..description: A grey square tile depicting a blue magical burst or explosion effect with orange-red accents, representing the older wizardry brand visual.

misc/brands/top_left/animated_weapon_new.description: Two crossed swords rendered in orange and gold pixel art, forming an X shape to indicate an animated weapon brand overlay for the top-left corner of a tile.

misc/brands/top_left/animated_weapon_old.description: A white wing or feather shape pointing left, representing the animated weapon brand overlay placed at the top-left of item tiles (older version).

misc/brands/top_left/i-c-flight.png.description: A dark shield with a blue question mark at the top-left, representing the flight brand overlay indicator for items.

misc/brands/top_left/i-clarity_new.png.description: A golden starburst with spiky rays surrounding a central blue square eye, representing the new clarity brand overlay for items.

misc/brands/top_left/i-clarity_old.png.description: A purple flask or potion bottle with a glowing blue liquid inside, representing the older clarity brand overlay for items.

misc/brands/top_left/i-conservation_new..description: A dark red/maroon shield with a purple diamond pattern at the top-left corner, representing the conservation brand overlay (new version) for items.

misc/brands/top_left/i-conservation_old..description: A bright yellow-outlined blue potion bottle with a glowing yellow border, representing the conservation brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-faith_new.png.description: A small red pixel-art musical note or key symbol placed in the top-left corner, representing a faith-related brand or status marker (new version).

misc/brands/top_left/i-faith_old.png.description: A small red pixel-art musical note or key symbol placed in the top-left corner, representing a faith-related brand or status marker (old version).

misc/brands/top_left/i-gourmand_new.png.description: A pixel art piece of cooked meat or food on a brown background, representing the new gourmand brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-gourmand_old.png.description: A pixel art piece of food (meat) displayed in a grey-bordered square frame, representing the old gourmand brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-inaccuracy_new.pn.description: A purple/violet feather or quill rendered diagonally against a dark background, representing the new inaccuracy brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-inaccuracy_old.pn.description: A grey-bordered square icon featuring a diagonal sword with purple/violet coloring, representing the old inaccuracy brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-r-corrosion_new.p.description: A black shield emblem with an orange flame motif at center, representing the new resistance-to-corrosion brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-r-corrosion_old.p.description: A yellow-bordered shield icon containing a silver armored torso or golem figure, representing the old resistance-to-corrosion brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-r-mutation_new.pn.description: A black shield emblem with a blue and red double-helix or DNA-like motif, representing the new resistance-to-mutation brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-r-mutation_old.pn.description: A colorful diamond-shaped shield icon with red, blue, yellow, and gold geometric patterns, representing the old resistance-to-mutation brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-rage_new.png.description: An orange/red glowing winged demon or bat face emblem on a dark background, representing the new rage brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-rage_old.png.description: A grey-bordered square icon featuring a red and silver winged demon or bat-like face emblem, representing the old rage brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-spirit_new.png.description: A black shield emblem with a blue glowing spirit or angelic wing pattern, representing the spirit brand overlay icon.

misc/brands/top_left/i-spirit_old.png.description: A blue shield-shaped brand icon with a white snowflake or star burst symbol, representing a spirit enchantment overlay in the old style.

misc/brands/top_left/i-stasis_new.png.description: A dark grey shield-shaped brand icon with a bright purple square in the center, representing a stasis enchantment in the new style.

misc/brands/top_left/i-stasis_old.png.description: A gold hourglass icon with a red heart inside, representing a stasis enchantment in the old style with warm golden tones.

misc/brands/top_left/i-warding_new.png.description: A dark shield-shaped brand icon with a green glowing snowflake or ward symbol, representing a warding enchantment in the new style.

misc/brands/top_left/i-warding_old.png.description: A dark shield-shaped brand icon with a green branching or tree-like warding symbol, representing a warding enchantment in the old style.

misc/brands/top_left/summoned.png.description: A cyan/light-blue pixel-art humanoid figure with arms outstretched in an X pose, used as a top-left corner brand to indicate a summoned creature.

misc/brands/top_left/summoned_durable.pn.description: A bright green octagonal badge with a brown humanoid figure silhouette, representing a durable summoned creature status overlay.

misc/brands/top_right/blind.png.description: A small cyan or teal helmet-shaped icon representing a blindness status effect brand overlay.

misc/brands/top_right/constricted.png.description: A small purple circle or orb icon placed in the top-right corner of a tile, representing a constriction status effect brand overlay.

misc/brands/top_right/deaths_door.png.description: A small glowing red-orange orb or sphere representing a death's door status effect brand in top-right overlay style.

misc/brands/top_right/drain.png.description: A red eye symbol with white diamond highlights on either side, representing a drain status effect brand overlay.

misc/brands/top_right/flame.png.description: A small orange and yellow flame icon in the top-right corner, representing a flame brand status effect overlay.

misc/brands/top_right/fleeing.png.description: A white exclamation mark or alert symbol icon in the top-right corner, representing a fleeing status effect brand overlay.

misc/brands/top_right/good_neutral_new.p.description: A small yellow smiley face icon representing a good neutral status in the new style brand overlay.

misc/brands/top_right/good_neutral_old.p.description: A small yellow smiley face icon representing a good neutral status in the old style brand overlay, slightly wider than the new version.

misc/brands/top_right/hasted.png.description: A blue right-pointing chevron or arrow icon in the top-right corner, representing a hasted or speed-boosted status effect brand overlay.

misc/brands/top_right/heart_new.png.description: A red pixel-art heart shape representing a heart or health brand overlay in the new style.

misc/brands/top_right/heart_old.png.description: A red pixel art heart icon with a downward chevron notch at the top, rendered in bold crimson on a dark background.

misc/brands/top_right/inner_flame.png.description: A small flame-topped pawn or figure shape in orange and red, resembling a burning token or inner-fire brand indicator.

misc/brands/top_right/may_stab_brand_new.description: A white question mark icon in the top-right corner, representing a may-stab or unaware-enemy brand overlay.

misc/brands/top_right/may_stab_brand_old.description: A bright yellow exclamation mark with a short dash beneath it, serving as a warning or alert indicator icon.

misc/brands/top_right/might.png.description: A golden trident or flame-crown symbol rendered in yellow-orange pixels, indicating a might or power brand.

misc/brands/top_right/neutral_new.png.description: A grey pixel art face with a neutral blank expression, depicted as a simple round face icon in dark grey tones.

misc/brands/top_right/neutral_old.png.description: A slightly smaller or lighter grey neutral face icon with a flat expression, similar to the new variant but in a different style.

misc/brands/top_right/new_stair_new.png.description: A bright yellow snowflake or asterisk star shape with multiple pointed arms, indicating a new stair or waypoint marker.

misc/brands/top_right/new_stair_old.png.description: A smaller yellow asterisk or starburst icon, a compact version of the new stair indicator in pixel art style.

misc/brands/top_right/pain_mirror.png.description: A red downward-right diagonal arrow with a stylized angular design, representing a pain mirror or redirect brand effect.

misc/brands/top_right/petrified.png.description: A tall grey rectangular tile with a light checkered or stone texture pattern inside a dark border, representing a petrified status brand.

misc/brands/top_right/petrifying.png.description: A warm tan or light brown rectangular tile with a wooden grain or cross-hatch texture inside a dark border, representing a petrifying status brand.

misc/brands/top_right/poison_new.png.description: A small dark green teardrop or drop-shaped icon, representing a new-style poison brand indicator.

misc/brands/top_right/poison_old.png.description: A bright magenta/purple teardrop-shaped poison droplet brand overlay icon for weapon tooltips, pointing downward.

misc/brands/top_right/recall.png.description: A small red flag icon with a dark pole, used as a brand overlay to indicate a recall enchantment on a weapon.

misc/brands/top_right/sleeping.png.description: White pixel-art 'Zz' text in the top-right corner indicating a sleeping status effect brand overlay on a creature tile.

misc/brands/top_right/sleeping_2.png.description: White pixel-art 'Zz' text in the top-right corner indicating a sleeping status effect brand overlay on a creature tile.

misc/brands/top_right/sleeping_full.png.description: A white text overlay brand icon displaying 'ZZzz' in stylized lettering, indicating a sleeping or dormant status effect for creatures.

misc/brands/top_right/sticky_flame.png.description: A small glowing flame icon in orange and yellow with a flickering top, used as a brand overlay to indicate a sticky flame status effect.

monster/angel.png.description: A winged angelic warrior in silver plate armour bearing a red cross on a white tabard, with large white feathered wings spread wide and a golden halo.

monster/anubis_guard.png.description: An anthropomorphic jackal-headed figure in Egyptian-style golden and blue garb, with a dark canine head and muscular humanoid body, resembling an Anubis guardian.

monster/big_kobold_new.png.description: A large, muscular kobold creature with dark grey fur, wearing a red plaid kilt and a small purple horn accessory, posed in an aggressive stance with one arm raised.

monster/big_kobold_old.png.description: A large bipedal kobold wearing a red outfit with purple accents and a hat, standing upright with arms raised in an aggressive or celebratory pose.

monster/boggart_new.png.description: A small jester-like humanoid (boggart) wearing a bright yellow pointed hat and matching yellow outfit with red boots, depicted in a friendly standing pose in the newer art style.

monster/boggart_old.png.description: A small jester-like humanoid (boggart) wearing a bright yellow pointed hat and matching yellow outfit with red boots, depicted in the older art style with slightly different proportions.

monster/brown_ooze.png.description: A lumpy brown amorphous blob creature covered in dark red spots, resembling a pile of mud or slime.

monster/centaur-melee.png.description: A centaur archer in melee pose with a drawn bow, human torso with tan skin and horse body in brown, leaning forward aggressively.

monster/centaur.png.description: A centaur archer standing upright with a green-trimmed bow raised, human torso and brown horse lower body in a ready stance.

monster/centaur_warrior-melee.png.description: A centaur warrior in melee attack pose wearing red armour, with a human upper body and horse lower body, wielding weapons in combat stance.

monster/centaur_warrior.png.description: A centaur warrior in red striped armour standing in a ready combat pose with a human torso and brown horse body.

monster/cyclops_new.png.description: A massive muscular cyclops giant with a single blue eye, pale skin, crouching with enormous fists, wearing a grey loincloth.

monster/cyclops_old.png.description: An old-style sprite of a cyclops, depicted as a large pale blue-grey creature with a rounded body, visible red beak-like mouth, and brown scaly underbody.

monster/daeva.png.description: A winged angelic figure in golden armour holding a large blue shield with a golden cross and a sword, with large white feathered wings spread wide.

monster/death_drake.png.description: A dark grey serpentine or draconic creature coiled low to the ground with glowing yellow eyes, appearing scaled and threatening.

monster/death_knight.png.description: A heavily armored undead knight surrounded by crackling cyan magical energy, wearing dark plate armour with a glowing skull face and a flowing dark cape.

monster/deep_dwarf.png.description: A stocky pale-skinned deep dwarf humanoid with a bald head and beard, wearing simple brown trousers and a checkered shirt, standing in a neutral pose.

monster/deep_dwarf_artificer.png.description: A stocky deep dwarf artificer wearing a blue robe and green cloak, with a red beard, standing upright in a frontal pose.

monster/deep_dwarf_berserker.png.description: A pale, muscular berserker with wild spiky hair, bare-chested and crouching aggressively in a brawling stance.

monster/deep_dwarf_death_knight.png.description: A heavily armored deep dwarf death knight in dark plate armour, carrying a large green and gold kite shield, with glowing eyes.

monster/deep_elf_annihilator.png.description: A deep elf mage in a flowing green and red robe with white hair, red eyes, holding a glowing golden staff with a forked top.

monster/deep_elf_blademaster.png.description: A deep elf blademaster in red and white robes with white hair and red eyes, standing in a martial combat stance with arms slightly raised.

monster/deep_elf_conjurer.png.description: A deep elf conjurer in a long green robe with white hair and red eyes, standing in a spellcasting pose with arms at sides.

monster/deep_elf_death_mage.png.description: A pale-haired deep elf death mage in a dark checkered robe with red trim, holding a skull in one hand and wearing a red cloak, with glowing red eyes.

monster/deep_elf_demonologist.png.description: A pale-haired deep elf demonologist in a flowing purple and magenta robe with gold chain necklace, arms outstretched in a casting pose with glowing red eyes.

monster/deep_elf_fighter_new.png.description: A pale-haired deep elf fighter in a newer style wearing green trousers and brown boots, carrying a dark sword in a combat-ready stance with glowing red eyes.

monster/deep_elf_fighter_old.png.description: A pale-haired deep elf fighter in an older style wearing green trousers and holding a sword and a brown shield, in a combat stance with glowing red eyes.

monster/deep_elf_high_priest.png.description: A pale-haired deep elf high priest in a bright blue robe with gold trim, holding a tall red-tipped staff, with glowing red eyes.

monster/deep_elf_knight_new.png.description: A pale-haired deep elf knight in new-style silver chainmail armour with a black-and-white checkered pattern, standing unarmed with glowing red eyes.

monster/deep_elf_knight_old.png.description: A pale-haired deep elf knight in old-style silver chainmail with a checkered pattern, holding a large blue kite shield with a gold trident emblem, with glowing red eyes.

monster/deep_elf_mage.png.description: A pale-haired deep elf mage in a flowing pink-salmon robe, arms slightly raised in a spellcasting gesture, with glowing red eyes.

monster/deep_elf_master_archer.png.description: A small pale-haired deep elf master archer wearing a green hooded cloak and brown boots, in a crouched stance suggesting ranged combat, with glowing red eyes.

monster/deep_elf_priest.png.description: A pale-haired deep elf priest in grey robes with a large red cross emblem and a blue gem, holding a weapon, with glowing red eyes.

monster/deep_elf_soldier.png.description: A pale-haired deep elf soldier in silver chainmail armour holding a brown sword and a blue-and-yellow heraldic shield, in a ready combat stance with glowing red eyes.

monster/dragons/quicksilver_dragon_new.p.description: A sinuous silver-blue quicksilver dragon with a long coiling serpentine body, shimmering metallic scales, and a flowing form.

monster/dragons/quicksilver_dragon_old.p.description: An orange and brown quicksilver dragon in an older sprite style, shown with large spread wings in a frontal roaring pose.

monster/dragons/shadow_dragon.png.description: A dark black shadow dragon with deep red highlights on its body and large dark wings, depicted in a menacing frontal stance.

monster/dragons/steam_dragon.png.description: A small pale grey wyvern-like steam dragon with a slender body and short wings, depicted in a side-facing profile pose.

monster/dragons/storm_dragon_new.png.description: A large deep blue and gold storm dragon with massive outstretched wings, yellow lightning-like markings on a powerful bipedal body.

monster/dragons/swamp_dragon_new.png.description: A dark green and brown swamp dragon with red-tipped wings spread wide, featuring a mottled camouflage-like scale pattern.

monster/dragons/wyvern_new.png.description: A green and teal wyvern with coiling body and pinkish belly, shown in a circular curled pose with visible claws and scales.

monster/eyes/eye_of_devastation_new.png.description: A glowing green orb with a single large black pupil at center, surrounded by a luminous green aura with sparkles, floating above a dark surface.

monster/eyes/eye_of_devastation_old.png.description: A disembodied eyeball surrounded by a ring of golden fire, depicted as a floating orb with a large dark pupil and flame halo.

monster/eyes/eye_of_draining.png.description: A large red spherical creature with a single menacing eye and a toothy grin, resembling a demonic orb with ridged red flesh.

monster/eyes/giant_eyeball.png.description: A simple floating grey eyeball with a blue iris and pupil, casting a small shadow below.

monster/eyes/golden_eye_new.png.description: A golden-yellow spherical eye creature with a textured scaly surface and dark pupil, rendered in a newer art style.

monster/eyes/golden_eye_old.png.description: A bright yellow spherical eye creature with a small dark pupil, rendered in an older flatter pixel art style.

monster/eyes/great_orb_of_eyes.png.description: A large pink fleshy orb covered with multiple small dark eyes distributed across its surface.

monster/eyes/shining_eye_new.png.description: A large magenta or purple floating eye with a red iris and dark pupil, surrounded by tentacle-like protrusions and a glowing purple aura.

monster/eyes/shining_eye_old.png.description: A vibrant magenta-purple orb with a single central eye and several upward-reaching tentacle-like protrusions tipped with small eyes.

monster/fungi_plants/briar_patch.png.description: A cluster of dark olive-green thorny bramble branches with curved hooking tendrils, representing a hazardous briar patch.

monster/fungi_plants/bush_2.png.description: A low spreading dark green bush with a crosshatch pixel pattern, viewed from above.

monster/fungi_plants/bush_3.png.description: A low spreading dark green bush with a slightly different crosshatch pixel pattern, viewed from above.

monster/fungi_plants/bush_4.png.description: A low spreading dark green bush with a wider crosshatch pixel pattern, viewed from above.

monster/fungi_plants/deathcap.png.description: A small humanoid mushroom creature with a dark purple stem body and large bright green spotted cap, standing upright.

monster/fungi_plants/giant_spore.png.description: A round yellow-green spore sac with darker green mottled patches, resembling an oversized floating fungal spore.

monster/fungi_plants/hyperactive_ballist.description: A red-orange mushroom creature with a broad spotted cap and dark stalk, rendered in fiery orange and crimson tones suggesting an agitated or hyperactive state.

monster/fungi_plants/oklob_plant.png.description: A vivid green plant monster with long spiky leaves and white thorny protrusions at its base, resembling an aggressive carnivorous plant with a dangerous acid-shooting form.

monster/fungi_plants/plant.png.description: A simple green plant with curling tentacle-like fronds on a dark background, rendered in medium green tones as a non-threatening dungeon vegetation sprite.

monster/fungi_plants/plant_crypt.png.description: A pale grey-white plant with wispy curling fronds, similar in form to the regular plant but rendered in desaturated tones suited for a crypt or undead environment.

monster/fungi_plants/plant_demonic.png.description: A swirling purple and magenta demonic plant with curling tentacle-like vines rendered in vivid violet and pink hues, exuding an otherworldly corrupted appearance.

monster/fungi_plants/thorn_hunter.png.description: A dark olive-green thorny vine creature coiled around a large red rose bloom, with curling tendrils and thorned stems, suggesting a plant-based predator.

monster/fungi_plants/thorn_lotus.png.description: A bright pink lotus flower with layered petals sitting atop large green lily pads, resembling a beautiful but deadly thorn lotus plant.

monster/fungi_plants/treant.png.description: A large dark brown treant with a gnarled humanoid tree body, glowing yellow eyes, and outstretched branch-like arms, appearing menacing and ancient.

monster/fungi_plants/vine_stalker.png.description: A humanoid figure with a mottled tan and brown latticed or vine-covered body, standing upright with arms slightly spread, resembling a vine-wrapped plant creature.

monster/fungi_plants/wandering_mushroom_.description: An orange and red mushroom creature with a large spotted cap, walking upright on pale yellowish legs in a dynamic striding pose.
An older-style orange mushroom creature sprite walking upright with a round spotted cap and pale body, slightly more compact than the new version.

monster/holy/angel_mace.png.description: A golden mace or scepter weapon with an ornate head and glowing holy aura, depicted as a divine weapon associated with angelic beings.

monster/holy/angel_new.png.description: A winged angelic warrior in silver plate armour bearing a red-cross shield and staff, with large white wings spread behind in a new detailed art style.

monster/holy/angel_old.png.description: An older-style winged angel sprite in silver plate armour with a red-cross shield and green holy shield, featuring large white wings and a commanding stance.

monster/holy/apis.png.description: A brown horse-like creature (ram or bull) with a golden crown or horns on its head, standing rearing on hind legs in a noble pose, suggesting a holy or divine beast.

monster/holy/centaur_paladin.png.description: A centaur warrior in heavy armour wielding a sword and bearing a red shield, with a brown horse body and armored upper torso in a combat-ready pose.

monster/holy/cherub.png.description: A winged humanoid cherub figure with white feathered wings, a bearded face, golden helmet, and robes, standing with arms outstretched in a divine or angelic pose.

monster/holy/daeva.png.description: A golden-armored angelic humanoid with large white feathered wings spread wide, depicted in a frontal pose with glowing blue eyes.

monster/holy/eastern_dragon.png.description: A large red and gold Eastern-style dragon with a serpentine body, horns, and clawed limbs, curled in a coiled attacking pose.

monster/holy/holy_dragon.png.description: A green-scaled dragon-like humanoid with large white feathered wings, standing upright in a frontal pose with arms spread.

monster/holy/ophan.png.description: A circular glowing wheel or disc with golden and white light emanating from it, resembling a divine celestial eye or ophan seraph.

monster/holy/paladin.png.description: A heavily armored golden humanoid warrior wearing a helmet and cloak, with a holy symbol on the chest, standing in a sturdy defensive pose.

monster/holy/seraph_bottom.png.description: The lower half of a seraph angel figure showing white-robed legs and golden-feathered wings spread wide, part of a two-tile tall sprite.

monster/holy/seraph_top.png.description: The upper half of a seraph angel figure showing a golden-armored torso with brilliant yellow radiating wings forming a large luminous arc.

monster/holy/shedu_new.png.description: A winged lion-like creature (shedu) with a human-faced head wearing a red crown, white feathered wings, and a tan body, standing in profile.

monster/holy/shedu_old.png.description: A shedu, a mythological bull-like creature with large white feathered wings and a tan/brown bovine body, facing right in profile.

monster/nonliving/air_elemental_new.png.description: A swirling humanoid air elemental rendered in pale blue-grey wisps, with a muscular torso shape and cloudy lower body hovering above the ground.

monster/nonliving/air_elemental_old.png.description: A tornado-shaped air elemental depicted as a cyan-blue swirling vortex tilted diagonally, with feathery wisp textures suggesting rapid spinning motion.

monster/nonliving/ball_lightning.png.description: A dark blue spherical ball of lightning covered in crackling white electrical arcs and a bright cyan core, glowing with electrical energy.

monster/nonliving/battlesphere.png.description: A glowing pink and white magical energy sphere with radiating light beams, representing a floating battlesphere magical construct.

monster/nonliving/clay_golem.png.description: A squat humanoid clay golem with a rounded tan-brown body, blocky limbs, and a featureless oval face, posed with arms slightly raised.

monster/nonliving/crystal_golem.png.description: A large crystalline golem composed of jagged pale-blue and teal crystal formations, with a broad hunched body and glowing inner light.

monster/nonliving/crystal_guardian.png.description: A humanoid crystalline golem made of light blue faceted crystal, with glowing joints, standing in a broad frontal pose.

monster/nonliving/earth_elemental.png.description: A muscular earth golem made of brown rocky stone with a thick humanoid shape, raised fists, and rough textured stone-like skin.

monster/nonliving/electric_golem.png.description: An electric golem depicted as a wireframe humanoid figure outlined in bright cyan-white lightning bolts, with an energized skeletal form.

monster/nonliving/fire_elemental_new.png.description: A fire elemental shown as a swirling mass of red, orange, and yellow flames with a bright yellow-white core, in an upright billowing form.

monster/nonliving/fire_elemental_old.png.description: A tall flickering fire elemental with orange and yellow flames forming a vaguely humanoid shape with glowing white eyes, rising from a dark base.

monster/nonliving/fire_vortex.png.description: A swirling red vortex or tornado shape tapering downward, rendered in deep crimson with a shadowed base suggesting spinning motion.

monster/nonliving/fire_vortex_1.png.description: A swirling vortex of fire with bright orange and red flame tendrils spinning outward from a glowing center, animation frame 1.

monster/nonliving/fire_vortex_2.png.description: A swirling vortex of fire with bright orange and red flame tendrils spinning outward from a glowing center, animation frame 2.

monster/nonliving/fire_vortex_3.png.description: A swirling vortex of fire with bright orange and red flame tendrils spinning outward from a glowing center, animation frame 3.

monster/nonliving/fire_vortex_4.png.description: A swirling vortex of fire with bright orange and red flame tendrils spinning outward from a glowing center, animation frame 4.

monster/nonliving/flesh_golem.png.description: A large hulking flesh golem with a brownish-pink rocky body accented with glowing red cracks, standing with arms outstretched in a wide stance.

monster/nonliving/fulminant_prism_1.png.description: A glowing cyan and blue triangular crystal prism with bright sparkle effects radiating outward, suggesting magical energy.

monster/nonliving/fulminant_prism_2.png.description: A glowing pink and magenta triangular crystal prism with bright sparkle effects radiating outward, a color variant of the fulminant prism.

monster/nonliving/fulminant_prism_3.png.description: A glowing cyan and blue triangular crystal prism with bright sparkle effects, nearly identical to variant 1 with subtle animation differences.

monster/nonliving/fulminant_prism_4.png.description: A glowing purple and violet triangular crystal prism with sparkle effects radiating outward, a darker color variant of the fulminant prism.

monster/nonliving/gargoyle.png.description: A pale grey stone gargoyle with large spread wings, glowing red eyes, and a menacing angular pixel art form perched in a frontal pose.

monster/nonliving/guardian_golem.png.description: A humanoid robot or golem figure with segmented silver-white armour plating, standing in a neutral defensive pose with arms at sides.

monster/nonliving/insubstantial_wisp.png.description: A wispy translucent cloud-like entity rendered in pale grey horizontal wisps, representing an insubstantial ethereal spirit.

monster/nonliving/iron_elemental.png.description: A large hulking iron elemental with a rust-brown metallic body in a gorilla-like hunched stance with thick limbs.

monster/nonliving/iron_golem.png.description: A squat silver iron golem with a barrel-like torso, glowing red eyes, thick metal limbs, and a heavily armored appearance in shiny grey tones.

monster/nonliving/maelstrom_1.png.description: A swirling circular vortex of purple and magenta energy with a spiral pattern, representing a magical maelstrom creature.

monster/nonliving/maelstrom_2.png.description: A swirling circular vortex of purple and magenta energy with a slightly different spiral pattern, an animation variant of the maelstrom.

monster/nonliving/maelstrom_3.png.description: A swirling circular vortex of purple and magenta energy with a dense spiral pattern, another animation frame of the maelstrom.

monster/nonliving/maelstrom_4.png.description: A swirling circular vortex of blue and purple energy with a tighter spiral pattern, a fourth animation variant of the maelstrom.

monster/nonliving/metal_gargoyle.png.description: A dark grey metallic gargoyle with large spread ribbed wings, glowing red eyes, and an imposing symmetrical frontal stance.

monster/nonliving/molten_gargoyle.png.description: A fiery red and orange winged gargoyle with glowing eyes, spreading large bat-like wings with a molten lava-orange inner surface and a menacing demonic silhouette.

monster/nonliving/orb_of_destruction_1.p.description: A large glowing hot-pink sphere with bright white highlights and a soft radiant glow, representing an orb of destruction.

monster/nonliving/orb_of_destruction_2.p.description: A large glowing magenta and pink sphere with a slightly different internal glow pattern, an animation variant of the orb of destruction.

monster/nonliving/orb_of_electricity.png.description: A glowing spherical orb crackling with purple and violet electrical energy, with lightning streaks radiating outward against a dark background.

monster/nonliving/orb_of_fire_new.png.description: A large blazing orb of fire with intense orange and yellow flames radiating outward in all directions, resembling a miniature sun.

monster/nonliving/orb_of_fire_old.png.description: A large radiant orb of fire with a bright white-yellow core surrounded by blazing orange and red flames, forming a glowing spherical explosion effect.

monster/nonliving/orb_of_ice.png.description: A swirling orb of icy blue flame-like energy with wispy curling tendrils radiating outward, giving it a cold ethereal appearance.

monster/nonliving/spatial_vortex.png.description: A swirling rainbow-colored vortex or spatial distortion rendered in vivid multicolor stripes (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple) tapering into a cone shape.

monster/nonliving/spatial_vortex_1.png.description: A swirling vortex of pink and purple energy with dark blue edges, forming a pinwheel-like spiral shape  animation frame 1.

monster/nonliving/spatial_vortex_2.png.description: A swirling vortex of pink and magenta energy with dark blue sweeping arms, forming a rotating spiral  animation frame 2.

monster/nonliving/spatial_vortex_3.png.description: A swirling vortex of bright magenta and purple energy with dark blue curling tendrils, forming a counterclockwise spiral  animation frame 3.

monster/nonliving/spatial_vortex_4.png.description: A swirling vortex of pink and purple energy with dark navy sweeping arms in a slightly different rotational phase  animation frame 4.

monster/nonliving/spectral_axe.png.description: A glowing cyan spectral battle axe with a translucent crystalline appearance, floating diagonally with an ethereal blue-teal glow.

monster/nonliving/spectral_lbl.png.description: A glowing cyan spectral long blade or glaive with a translucent crystalline appearance, floating diagonally with an ethereal blue-teal glow.

monster/nonliving/spectral_mace.png.description: A glowing cyan spectral mace rendered diagonally, with ethereal wisps of blue-green flame emanating from its head and handle.

monster/nonliving/spectral_sbl.png.description: A glowing cyan spectral short blade rendered diagonally, with crackling blue-green ghostly energy surrounding the blade.

monster/nonliving/spectral_spear.png.description: A glowing cyan spectral spear rendered diagonally, with wispy blue-green ethereal flames tracing along its shaft and tip.

monster/nonliving/spectral_staff.png.description: A glowing cyan spectral staff rendered diagonally, with ethereal blue-green energy swirling along its length.

monster/nonliving/spectral_whip.png.description: A glowing cyan spectral whip rendered diagonally with a curling tail, surrounded by wispy blue-green ghostly flames.

monster/nonliving/spellforged_servitor.p.description: A humanoid golem-like construct with a blue-grey metallic body in a wide stance, arms raised, with a glowing pink magical rune or sigil floating above its head.

monster/nonliving/stone_golem.png.description: A hulking stone golem with a blocky grey rocky body, glowing red eyes, and a wide squat stance with stubby limbs.

monster/nonliving/test_spawner_new.png.description: A test spawner depicted as a glowing orange diamond-shaped arrow pointing downward with the word TEST overlaid in white text, indicating a debug/placeholder sprite.

monster/nonliving/test_spawner_old.png.description: An older test spawner sprite depicted as a white humanoid figure on a grey pedestal base with the letters TEST overlaid in red, indicating an older debug/placeholder sprite.

monster/nonliving/toenail_golem.png.description: A toenail golem rendered as a pink-beige crab-like creature with a domed shell made of curved nail-like segments and multiple stubby legs.

monster/nonliving/twister_1.png.description: A white and grey swirling wind vortex with wispy curling tendrils and bright white highlights, suggesting a miniature tornado  animation frame 1.

monster/nonliving/twister_2.png.description: A white and pale grey swirling tornado-like spiral with sweeping wind arms and bright white accents  animation frame 2.

monster/nonliving/twister_3.png.description: A larger white and light grey swirling wind vortex with broad sweeping arms and bright white highlights  animation frame 3.

monster/nonliving/twister_4.png.description: A white and silver swirling wind spiral with curling misty tendrils and crisp white highlights, forming a compact twister shape  animation frame 4.

monster/nonliving/ushabti.png.description: A golden Egyptian-style sarcophagus figure with a blue and gold striped headdress, crossed arms, and ornate body markings, depicted as a standing animated construct.

monster/nonliving/vapour.png.description: A swirling vapour cloud rendered as a radial burst of white and grey pixels with a bright glowing center, suggesting a misty or gaseous entity.

monster/nonliving/water_elemental_new.pn.description: A large amorphous water elemental with a pale blue-grey bulbous body, dark green mossy patches, and stubby arms, appearing as a magical aquatic entity.

monster/nonliving/water_elemental_old.pn.description: An old water elemental sprite depicted as a blue-robed hooded figure with no visible face, standing upright in a flowing cobalt robe.

monster/nonliving/wellspring.png.description: A wellspring depicted as a swirling dark blue orb with a crescent of white and pale blue water energy wrapping around it, suggesting a magical water source.

monster/nonliving/wood_golem.png.description: A wooden golem creature made of orange-brown wooden planks or logs arranged in a humanoid cross-shaped body with a round head, rendered in warm orange and brown tones.

monster/panlord/demon_body_armor_bottom..description: The lower body segment of a demonic pandeomoniun lord creature, showing dark clawed legs with yellow-gold taloned feet against a dark body.

monster/panlord/demon_body_armor_top.png.description: The upper body segment of a demonic pandemonium lord wearing dark body armour, featuring a teal/cyan spiky carapace with menacing eyes and clawed appendages.

monster/panlord/demon_body_caterpillar_b.description: The lower caterpillar-like body segment of a pandemonium lord variant, showing teal-blue segmented lower body with yellow-gold clawed legs.

monster/panlord/demon_body_caterpillar_t.description: The upper body segment of a caterpillar-form pandemonium lord, showing yellow and black striped insect-like wings or appendages with clawed yellow limbs.

monster/panlord/demon_body_crouch_bottom.description: The lower crouching body segment of a pandemonium lord, depicting teal-blue muscular crouched legs with yellow-gold clawed feet in a squatting stance.

monster/panlord/demon_body_crouch_top.pn.description: The upper crouching body segment of a pandemonium lord, showing a teal-blue muscular torso with the figure in a crouched position with yellow-tipped clawed hands.

monster/panlord/demon_body_fat_bottom_ne.description: The new version of the lower fat body segment of a pandemonium lord, showing a large teal-blue rotund lower torso with stumpy yellow clawed feet.

monster/panlord/demon_body_fat_bottom_ol.description: The old version of the lower fat body segment of a pandemonium lord, depicting a dark grey-black large rounded lower torso with orange-yellow clawed feet.

monster/panlord/demon_body_fat_top_new.p.description: The new version of the upper fat body segment of a pandemonium lord, showing a teal-blue massive bloated upper torso with stubby clawed arms.

monster/panlord/demon_body_fat_top_old.p.description: The old version of the upper fat body segment of a pandemonium lord, depicting a dark grey segmented large upper torso with yellow clawed arms in older pixel art style.

monster/panlord/demon_body_fatter_bottom.description: The new version of the lower extra-fat body segment of a pandemonium lord, showing an extremely large teal-blue rotund lower body with tiny yellow clawed feet barely visible beneath.
The lower half of a fat demon body variant (old style) showing dark charcoal-grey thick legs with orange-yellow flame accents at the feet and claws.

monster/panlord/demon_body_fatter_top_ne.description: The upper torso of a fat demon body variant (new style) showing a large teal-blue scaly upper body with broad shoulders and a yellow-orange flame accent at the side.

monster/panlord/demon_body_fatter_top_ol.description: The upper torso of a fat demon body variant (old style) showing a dark grey bulky upper body with broad shoulders and orange-yellow flame highlights.

monster/panlord/demon_body_mantis_bottom.description: The lower half of a mantis-styled demon body showing teal-blue segmented insectoid legs with yellow-orange claw tips in a crouching stance.

monster/panlord/demon_body_mantis_top.pn.description: The upper torso of a mantis-styled demon body showing a teal-blue segmented insectoid chest with elongated blade-like arms and yellow accents.

monster/panlord/demon_body_normal_bottom.description: The lower half of a normal demon body (new style) showing teal-blue scaled digitigrade legs with yellow-orange clawed feet in a standing pose.
The lower half of a normal demon body (old style) showing dark grey digitigrade legs with orange-yellow claw accents at the feet.

monster/panlord/demon_body_normal_top_ne.description: The upper torso of a normal demon body (new style) showing a teal-blue muscular humanoid chest with long tentacle-like arms hanging down.

monster/panlord/demon_body_normal_top_ol.description: The upper torso of a normal demon body (old style) showing a dark grey muscular humanoid chest with yellow-orange flowing tentacle-like limbs.

monster/panlord/demon_body_skeletal_bott.description: The lower half of a skeletal demon body showing thin teal-blue bone-like legs with yellow claw tips in a wide stance.

monster/panlord/demon_body_skeletal_top..description: The upper torso of a skeletal demon body showing a teal-blue ribcage structure with visible bones and hunched skeletal posture.

monster/panlord/demon_body_spiked_bottom.description: The lower half of a spiked demon body (new style) showing teal-blue legs with prominent yellow-orange spines and clawed feet.
The lower body half of an old spiked demon panlord variant, showing orange and black spiky limbs or appendages splayed outward against a dark background.

monster/panlord/demon_body_spiked_top_ne.description: The upper body half of a new spiked demon panlord variant, depicting a teal and yellow spiky torso with outstretched arms and prominent spines.

monster/panlord/demon_body_spiked_top_ol.description: The upper body half of an old spiked demon panlord variant, showing an orange and dark brown spiky torso with outstretched clawed arms.

monster/panlord/demon_body_spotty_bottom.description: The lower body half of a new spotty demon panlord variant, showing teal and yellow spotted legs with small clawed feet.
The lower body half of an old spotty demon panlord variant, featuring dark orange and black mottled legs with small appendages.

monster/panlord/demon_body_spotty_top_ne.description: The upper body half of a new spotty demon panlord, depicting a teal and light blue lumpy spotted torso with yellow accents and outstretched arms.

monster/panlord/demon_body_spotty_top_ol.description: The upper body half of an old spotty demon panlord, showing a grey and dark mottled torso covered in bumps or spots with orange clawed arms.

monster/panlord/demon_body_succubus_bott.description: The lower body half of a succubus demon panlord, showing teal flowing robes or legs with yellow trim against a dark background.

monster/panlord/demon_body_succubus_top..description: The upper body half of a succubus demon panlord, depicting a teal-robed humanoid upper body with flowing dark cloak and yellow accents.

monster/panlord/demon_body_tentacley_bot.description: The lower body half of a tentacled demon panlord, showing large splayed yellow and teal tentacles spreading downward from the torso.

monster/panlord/demon_body_tentacley_top.description: The upper body half of a tentacled demon panlord, depicting a teal tentacled torso with yellow highlights and writhing appendages.

monster/panlord/demon_body_thin_bottom_n.description: The lower body half of a new thin demon panlord variant, showing slender teal and yellow legs with a dark flowing lower half.

monster/panlord/demon_body_thin_bottom_o.description: The bottom half of a thin demon body in orange and black, showing clawed legs and a tail with fiery orange accents, old variant.

monster/panlord/demon_body_thin_top_new..description: The upper torso of a thin demon body in teal and yellow-orange, showing a muscular hunched form with arms and clawed hands, new variant.

monster/panlord/demon_body_thin_top_old..description: The upper torso of a thin demon body in dark teal and orange, showing a muscular hunched form with arms and clawed hands, old variant.

monster/panlord/demon_head_bird_top_new..description: A small yellow-orange bird head sprite with a red eye, depicted in profile facing left, new variant for a pandemonium lord demon head.

monster/panlord/demon_head_bird_top_old..description: A small orange bird head sprite with a red eye, depicted in profile facing left, old variant for a pandemonium lord demon head.

monster/panlord/demon_head_boxes_top.png.description: A rectangular blocky yellow-gold geometric head composed of stacked box shapes with a checkered texture, for a pandemonium lord demon.

monster/panlord/demon_head_brain_top.png.description: A large yellow-gold brain-shaped head with convoluted folds, representing a grotesque exposed brain demon head for a pandemonium lord.

monster/panlord/demon_head_butterfly_top.description: A small teal and yellow butterfly or moth-shaped demon head with decorative wing-like protrusions and ornate curling details.

monster/panlord/demon_head_cow_skull_top.description: A pale blue cow skull head with golden horns and yellow teeth, representing a bovine skull demon head for a pandemonium lord.

monster/panlord/demon_head_cthulhu_top_n.description: A large teal and yellow Cthulhu-like tentacled demon head with a prominent pink/magenta central feature and dangling tentacles, new variant.

monster/panlord/demon_head_cthulhu_top_o.description: A large orange and dark Cthulhu-like tentacled demon head with a prominent pink central feature and dangling yellow tentacles, old variant.

monster/panlord/demon_head_elephant_top_.description: A teal elephant-like demon head with a curving trunk, tusks, and a red eye, representing an elephant-themed pandemonium lord head, new variant.
A grey elephant-trunk demon head facing left with an orange-tipped proboscis, rendered as a side-profile pixel art sprite for a pandemonium lord.

monster/panlord/demon_head_eyeball_top_n.description: A large teal-and-yellow eyeball with a golden iris and dark pupil, depicted from above as a pandemonium lord head variant.

monster/panlord/demon_head_eyeball_top_o.description: A large orange eyeball with a white pupil and dark iris ring, viewed from above as an older pandemonium lord head variant.

monster/panlord/demon_head_fly_top.png.description: A small teal and yellow fly-like demon head viewed from above, with wing-like appendages and a segmented insect body.

monster/panlord/demon_head_frog_top.png.description: A teal frog-faced demon head with yellow accents viewed from above, featuring wide eyes and a broad flat snout.

monster/panlord/demon_head_fungus_top.pn.description: A golden mushroom-cap demon head viewed from above, resembling a broad fungal growth with yellow and teal coloration.

monster/panlord/demon_head_hair_top.png.description: A dark chaotic mass of yellow and black checkered hair or tentacles forming a demon head top-down view, with a wild scattered pattern.

monster/panlord/demon_head_heads_top.png.description: A dark grey fungal or multi-headed demon crown viewed from above, dotted with several bright red glowing eyes across its surface.

A large wispy translucent green spectral snake or serpentine ghost form with a broad flowing body and no distinct features.

A glowing green spectral spider with multiple radiating legs spread wide, bright translucent green body, and white sparkle highlights in a splayed pose.

monster/undead/spectrals/spectral_thing..description: A glowing green spectral entity with wispy, claw-like tendrils extending outward, rendered in bright lime green with yellow highlight spots on a dark background.

monster/undead/spectrals/spectral_worm.p.description: A bright green spectral worm with a segmented, sinuous body curving in an S-shape, covered in yellow glowing spots and small purple accents.

monster/undead/zombies/zombie_crab.png.description: A zombie crab with a bloated brown crab body, multiple legs curled inward, and pink glowing eyes or decay markings scattered across its carapace.

monster/undead/zombies/zombie_ugly_thing.description: A decayed zombie version of an ugly thing, rendered as a dark tentacled mass with drooping pink appendages and a hunched form.

monster/unique/agnes_new.png.description: Agnes, a female unique warrior in white and brown clothing with a green headband and yellow sash, standing in a combat-ready pose.

monster/unique/serpent_of_hell-coc_botto.description: The lower-body segment of the Cocytus Serpent of Hell, depicted as a large blue-scaled serpentine beast with clawed legs and coiling tail rendered in icy blue and white hues.

monster/unique/serpent_of_hell-dis_botto.description: The lower-body segment of the Dis Serpent of Hell, a large reptilian creature with brownish-red scales and clawed limbs, depicted in a crawling pose.

monster/unique/serpent_of_hell-dis_top.p.description: The upper-body segment of the Dis Serpent of Hell, showing a reddish-brown scaled draconic torso and head with white claws and menacing posture.

monster/unique/serpent_of_hell-geh_botto.description: The lower-body segment of the Gehenna Serpent of Hell, a massive fire-colored serpentine creature with bright orange and red scales and sharp white claws.

monster/unique/serpent_of_hell-geh_top.p.description: The upper-body segment of the Gehenna Serpent of Hell, depicting a fierce red and orange fire dragon with glowing yellow underbelly and snarling jaws.

monster/unique/serpent_of_hell-tar_botto.description: The lower-body segment of the Tartarus Serpent of Hell, a large serpentine demon with dark purple and teal iridescent scales and heavy clawed limbs.

monster/unique/serpent_of_hell-tar_top.p.description: The upper-body segment of the Tartarus Serpent of Hell, showing a hulking purple-and-green scaled dragon with glowing accents and threatening raised claws.

monster/unique/serpent_of_hell.png.description: A large full-body Serpent of Hell sprite depicted as a massive fiery orange and red coiled dragon with glowing embers and white-tipped claws.

monster/unique/sigmund_new.png.description: An elderly wizard with a flaming head and white beard, dressed in red and gold robes, wielding a curved scimitar in an action combat stance.

monster/unique/sigmund_old.png.description: Sigmund (old version), a robed humanoid figure in red and gold clothing wielding a scythe, depicted in a side-facing attack pose.

monster/unique/snorg_new.png.description: A large green troll-like monster with a wide fanged mouth, bulky clawed hands, and pale underbelly, depicted in a hulking standing pose.

monster/unique/snorg_old.png.description: Snorg (old version), a large stocky green troll-like creature with a dark face and broad shoulders, depicted in a hunched forward stance.

monster/unique/sojobo.png.description: Sojobo, a tengu-like humanoid creature with an orange fox or bird-like head, wearing a red robe with a blue sash and holding a weapon.

monster/unique/sonja_old.png.description: A green-skinned goblin or kobold figure wearing a red hat and dark green clothing, holding a weapon and depicted in a sneaky or aggressive crouched stance.
